K01vinv06_u:18: etarhi śāradakena rogeṇa bādhyamānā utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukā bhavanti kṛṣālukā durbalakā mlānā aprāptakāyāḥ /

K01vinv06_u:55: yad vā punar anyad api puṣpabhaiṣajyārthāya spharati nāmiṣārthāya /

K01vinv06_u:408: iti kṛtvā sāptāhaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ saptāhātikrāntaṃ na paribhoktavyam* {MS adds saptāhasyātyayān

K01vinv06_u:474: ke vayaṃ saddharmasya jñātāra iti viditvā tatraiva nimagnau /

K01vinv06_u:490: atha śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocan* /
K01vinv06_u:491: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavān* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv06_u:492: atha bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā yācamāna evaṃ cāha /
K01vinv06_u:493: bhagavatā te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣā vinītāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:494: iyaṃ bhadanta kuntī yakṣiṇī asmākaṃ dīrgharātram asapatnānāṃ sapatnī adrugdhānāṃ drogdhrī jātāni jātāny apatyāni harati /
K01vinv06_u:495: aho vata bhagavān kuntīṃ yakṣiṇīṃ vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
K01vinv06_u:496: tena khalu samayena kuntī yakṣiṇī tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇābhūt* sannipatitā /
K01vinv06_u:504: viraṃsyāmi yady ete mamārthāya vihāraṃ kārayanti /
K01vinv06_u:510: atha bhagavān kuntīṃ yakṣīṇīṃ saparivārāṃ vinīya prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:514: bhagavān bāladārakān pāṃsustūpakaiḥ krīḍato dṛṣṭvā ca (MSV I 2)
K01vinv06_u:516: paśyasi tvaṃ vajrapāṇe bāladārakān pāṃsustūpakaiḥ krīḍataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:518: eṣa caturvarṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama vajrapāṇe kuśanavaṃśyaḥ kaniṣko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:522: tato bhagavān yāvac cāpalālasya bhavanaṃ yāvac ca rohitakam atrāntare saptasaptatiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinīya rohitakam āgatya vihāraṃ praviśya pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:523: bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāyāyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:536: gato 'ham ānanda yāvac ca rohitakaṃ yāvac cāpalālasya nāgarājasya bhuvanam* /
K01vinv06_u:538: pañcādīnavā uttarāpathe sthāṇukaṇṭakadrumapāṣāṇaśarkaraś caṇḍakukkuro duṣṭhulasamudācāro mātṛgrāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:541: ādirājyaṃ ca bhadrāśvo mathurā otalā ca /
K01vinv06_u:542: ārāmavairaṃbhya ayodhyā ca nadī gaṅgā pretā velāmo bhavati paścimaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:543: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann ādirājyam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:545: asminn ānanda pradeśe mahāsammato rājā prathamato rājyābhiṣekenābhiṣiktaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:546: abhiṣikto 'yaṃ ca rājñām ādirato 'syādirājyaḥ ādirājya iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv06_u:549: asminn ānanda pradeśe rājño mahāsammatasya bhadram aśvaratnaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ yato 'sya bhadrāśvo bhadrāśva iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv06_u:552: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
K01vinv06_u:554: dūrād eva nīlanīlāṃ bhagavān vanarājiṃ dṛṣṭvā punar āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:555: paśyasi tvam ānanda etāṃ nīlanīlāṃ vanarājim* /
K01vinv06_u:558: atra mathurāyāṃ naṭo bhaṭaś ca dvau bhrātarau mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:559: tatas tasya naṭabhaṭika iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:562: adyānanda mathurāyāṃ gupto nāma gāndhikadārako bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:563: tasya putraḥ upagupto nāma bhaviṣyati alakṣaṇako buddhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:564: sa mama varṣoṣitasya parinirvṛtasya śāsane pravrajya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:572: ye ye tasyāvavāde arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti te te caturaṅgulamātrāṃ kaṭikāṃ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ prakṣepsyante /
K01vinv06_u:573: yadā sā guhā purṇā bhaviṣyati arhatkaṭikābhis tadā upaguptaḥ parinirvāsyati /
K01vinv06_u:574: parinirvṛtaṃ cainaṃ tābhir evārhatkaṭikābhiḥ sametya te dhmāpayiṣyanti /
K01vinv06_u:575: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripapracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:576: bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān upagupto 'nāgata eva bahujanānukampī vyākṛta iti /
K01vinv06_u:578: na bhikṣava etarhi yathāsāv atīte 'py adhvani bahujanahitāya pratipannas tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye /
K01vinv06_u:579: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asyaiva urumuṇḍasya parvatasya triṣu pārśveṣu pratyekabuddhā ṛṣayo markaṭāś ca prativasanti /
K01vinv06_u:581: pratyekabuddhaśatāni dvitīye pañca ṛṣiśatāni tṛtīye pañca markaṭaśatāni /
K01vinv06_u:582: ācaritaṃ markaṭayūthapater jātaṃ jātaṃ markaṭaśāvakaṃ praghātayati /
K01vinv06_u:583: tatas tā markaṭyaḥ śāvakaśokābhibhūtāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:585: ayam asmākaṃ yūthapatir jātaṃ jātaṃ śāvakaṃ praghātayati /
K01vinv06_u:587: yā asmākaṃ markaṭī āpannasatvā bhavati tayā yūthapater nārocayitavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:588: yāvad apareṇa samayenānyatamā markaṭī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv06_u:589: sā tābhiḥ pratigupte pradeśe gopāyitvā mūlaphalair upasthāpitā /
K01vinv06_u:591: so 'pi tābhiḥ pratigupte pradeśe sthāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:592: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tenāsau yūthapatiḥ svayūthāt pracyāvitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:597: yadā viśvastasaṃvāsaḥ saṃvṛttas {MS smṛtaḥ} tadā teṣāṃ mūlapatrapuṣpaphaladantakāṣṭhair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti /
K01vinv06_u:599: ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā paryaṅke niṣīdanti /
K01vinv06_u:600: so 'pi markaṭas teṣām īryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkena niṣīdati /
K01vinv06_u:601: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānām etad abhavat* /
K01vinv06_u:603: prāptaṃ tad yan nu vayaṃ śāntaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśema iti /
K01vinv06_u:604: tatas te jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:607: sa markaṭas tān apaśyan dhṛtiṃ na labhate /
K01vinv06_u:608: yāvad asau markaṭo guhāṃ praviśya teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ cīvarāṇi vikopayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:609: yā devatā tasyāṃ guhāyām adhyuṣitā tasyā etad abhavat* /
K01vinv06_u:611: pratyekabuddhacīvarāṇi vikopayiṣyatīti dvāraṃ mahatyā śilayā pidhāyāvasthitā /
K01vinv06_u:612: tato 'sau markaṭaḥ śocitvā klamitvā paridevitvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:614: anabhiratitvād dhṛtiṃ na labhamāno 'vahitaśrotro manuṣyaśabdam ākāṃkṣati /
K01vinv06_u:616: sa mārgapranaṣṭa ivādhvagas tvaritatvaritaṃ teṣāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:621: yadāsau markaṭas taiḥ sārdhaṃ viśvastasaṃvāsaḥ saṃvṛttas tadā teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ mūlapatrapuṣpaphaladantakāṣṭhair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti /
K01vinv06_u:623: sa teṣām īryāpathaṃ vyākopya pratyekabuddheryāpathaṃ deśayati /
K01vinv06_u:624: tatra ye ūrdhvahastakās teṣāṃ hastān adhaḥ kṛtvā ricchaṭāśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā purastāt paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvatiṣṭhate /
K01vinv06_u:625: ye pañcatapas tapyante teṣām agniṃ nirvāpya ricchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā purastāt paryaṅkenāvatiṣṭhate /
K01vinv06_u:630: bhavantaḥ smṛtimanto hy ete śākhāmṛgā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:633: yūyam api yathāsthāpitaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdatha /
K01vinv06_u:636: tair anācāryakair anupādhyāyakair jñānena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmān utpādya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtas teṣāṃ markaṭasyāntike dharmānvayaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:638: navaphalāni navartukāni janapadāt piṇḍapātaṃ pratilabhate tāni tasmai prathamato datvā tata ātmanaḥ paribhuñjate /
K01vinv06_u:639: tāvad apareṇa samayena sa markaṭaḥ kālagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:640: tatas taiḥ pratyekabuddhair nānādigdeśādhiṣṭhāneṣu gandhakāṣṭhāni samādāpya sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā dhmāpitaḥ
K01vinv06_u:642: yo 'sau pratyekabuddhaiḥ saṃpoṣito markaṭaḥ sa evāsāv upaguptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:643: tadāpy asau bahujanahitāya pratipannaḥ etarhy apy asau mayā bahujanahitānukampī vyākṛta iti /
K01vinv06_u:644: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran mathurām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:645: aśrauṣur māthurā brāhmaṇāḥ śramaṇo gautamo mathurām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:646: so 'tyarthaṃ cāturvarṇaviśuddhiṃ rocayati dīpayati prajñapayati prasthāpayati virujati vivṛṇoti uttānīkaroti deśayati /
K01vinv06_u:647: yady asau mathurāṃ pravekṣyati asmākaṃ lābhāntarāyo bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:649: yadi tasya kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryād evam asau mathurāṃ na praviśet* iti cāsya nīcapuruṣo 'satkāraṃ kuryāt* (MSV I 8)
K01vinv06_u:651: yady asya pradhānapuruṣaḥ kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryāc chobhanaṃ syāt* /
K01vinv06_u:653: tena khalu samayena mathurāyāṃ nīlabhūtir nāma brāhmaṇo vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ svavādoddyotakaḥ paravādanigrahasamarthaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:655: tato māthurā brāhmaṇāḥ saṅgamya samāgamya nīlabhūteḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:656: upādhyāya śrūyate śramaṇo gautamo ihāgata iti /
K01vinv06_u:659: yadi tasya kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryād evam asau mathurāṃ na pravekṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:660: yadi cāsya nīcapuruṣo 'satkāraṃ kariṣyati na citrīkariṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:661: yady asya pradhānapuruṣaḥ kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryāc chobhanaṃ syāt* /
K01vinv06_u:668: tato nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo vṛddhavṛddhair mathurānivāsibhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:669: adrākṣīn nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K01vinv06_u:670: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyomaprabhālaṅkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ (MSV I 9)
K01vinv06_u:671: jaṃgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam anyataraṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya śāntena īryāpathena niṣaṇṇam* /
K01vinv06_u:679: caraṇaṃ susamāptam eva te susamāptavrata sādhitavrataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:680: balavāṃś ca samādhir avyayas tava nārāyaṇaśailarājavat* // 3
K01vinv06_u:681: puruṣarṣabha nāsti te vyathā na viṣādo na bhayaṃ na ca klamaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:682: na ca te vyasanaṃ kutaḥ kalir na ca bhūteṣu kadācid akṣamā // 4
K01vinv06_u:683: na ca dhāvasi nātilīyase na ca santapyasi nāpi hṛṣyase /
K01vinv06_u:684: satataṃ śubham eva te manaḥ satataṃ merur ivācalādhipaḥ // 5
K01vinv06_u:685: munipuṅgava sarvadhātubhir vipulaṃ jñānam apāvṛtaṃ tava /
K01vinv06_u:687: na ca te 'sti mune kathaṃkathā vimatir nāsti na saṃśayaḥ kvacit* /
K01vinv06_u:688: svayam eva na te parāparaṃ viditaṃ sarvam avedi vidyayā // 7
K01vinv06_u:691: samam eva hi te priyāpriyaṃ satataṃ prītikaras tatheryase // 8
K01vinv06_u:693: vividānumataṃ prabhāṣase triṣu lokeṣu ca te stṛtaṃ yaśaḥ / 9
K01vinv06_u:695: upagamya mune punaḥ punaḥ paripṛcchanti na cābhiṣūyase // 10
K01vinv06_u:697: pratiyānti vinītasaṃśayāś caraṇau vandya ca te mahāmune // 11
K01vinv06_u:698: sthitam āsitam āgataṃ gataṃ śayitaṃ maunam athābhyudīritam* /
K01vinv06_u:699: atha cīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ ruciraṃ gautama sarvam eva te // 12
K01vinv06_u:701: vacanaṃ punar uktavarjitaṃ samaye vyāharase narottama // 13
K01vinv06_u:702: balavān asi lokaviśrutaḥ puruṣajñaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ prabhuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:703: na ca manyasi nāvamanyase sakalaṃ lokam imaṃ sadaivatam* // 14
K01vinv06_u:704: na ca vismayase kadācana prakṛtistheṣu calācaleṣu ca /
K01vinv06_u:705: suhṛdeṣu ca durhṛdeṣu ca pratikūleṣv anulomavatsu ca // 15
K01vinv06_u:709: prasamīkṣya jagat samākulaṃ vividhair duḥkhaśatair upadrutam* /
K01vinv06_u:711: avatārya muner mahākṛpāṃ vividhāṃ cātmagatāṃ prabhāvatām* /
K01vinv06_u:712: svayam eva hi śākyapuṅgava vyathitān mocayituṃ tvam udyataḥ // 18
K01vinv06_u:713: bhavaduḥkham idaṃ sahetukaṃ bhavaduḥkhasya ca yaḥ parikṣayaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:716: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kuto 'dhikas triṣu lokeṣv api naiva vidyate // 20
K01vinv06_u:718: na santi te na ca te santi mune parisravāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:719: anurodhavirodhavigrahāḥ satataṃ suvrata naiva naiva te // 21
K01vinv06_u:720: apahāya mune priyāpriye sukhaduḥkhe viṣamaṃ samaṃ tathā /
K01vinv06_u:721: aratiṃ ca ratiṃ viparyayann upaśāntaś carasīha saṃyataḥ // 22
K01vinv06_u:722: vyasane na ca nāma nirmanā na ca nāmonnamase praśaṃsayā /
K01vinv06_u:723: ayaśaś ca yaśaś ca te samaṃ samam ākruṣṭam athāpi vanditam* // 23
K01vinv06_u:724: ativākyam atho titikṣase puruṣaṃ pāpajanair udīritam* /
K01vinv06_u:725: samarāgragato viṣāṇavān bhṛśamuktān iva kuñjaraḥ śarān* // 24
K01vinv06_u:727: suvacas tvam ṛṣe vacaḥkṣamaḥ sudurukteṣv api nābhiṣūyase /
K01vinv06_u:728: samam eva ca vartase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu vākṣu ca // 25
K01vinv06_u:730: ṛṣibhiś ca sadā mahātmabhir na ca te vikriyate sthiraṃ manaḥ // 26
K01vinv06_u:731: pravaro 'ham ito na manyase 'tyavaro 'ham ito na manyase /
K01vinv06_u:732: sadṛśo 'ham ito na manyase trividhā mānavidhā na santi te // 27
K01vinv06_u:734: tṛṇakāṣṭhasamaṃ mahāmune carasīdaṃ hi sadevakaṃ jagat* // 28
K01vinv06_u:736: adhivāsayase nagendravan na ca te pravyathate sthiraṃ manaḥ // 29
K01vinv06_u:738: idam arthikato nideśase pratisaṃkhyāya mune nirāsravam* // 30
K01vinv06_u:739: na ca śocasi nātha nāsti me na ca te santi mune parigrahāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:741: na ca lābham avāpya hṛṣyase tadalābhāc ca layaṃ na gacchasi /
K01vinv06_u:742: avamānam atho titikṣase na ca saṃmānam ihābhinandasi // 32
K01vinv06_u:745: asayo niśitāḥ śarāś ca te na vikurvanti manaḥ kadācana // 33
K01vinv06_u:746: na kathāṃ kathayasy anarthikāṃ na ca yā durjanasevitā kathā /
K01vinv06_u:747: na ca lābhakathā na sāmiṣā na ca yā nānumatā mahātmabhiḥ // 34
K01vinv06_u:748: pravivekakathāḥ sukhāvahāḥ praśamaṃ yāḥ pravadanti kevalam* /
K01vinv06_u:749: kathayasy atidevatāḥ kathāḥ kathitā yā vinayanti kilviṣam* // 35
K01vinv06_u:750: madhurāṇi ca saṅgatāni ca svabhinītāni ca sāravanti ca /
K01vinv06_u:751: vacanāni mune prabhāṣase jagadarthāya viniścitāni ca // 36
K01vinv06_u:753: piśunāḥ paruṣāḥ śaṭhāś ca ye bhagavaṃs taiḥ saha saṅgataṃ na te // 37
K01vinv06_u:754: aśaṭhā ṛjavaś ca ye narāḥ śucayaḥ satyaratā jitendriyāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:755: satataṃ ca samīkṣyakāriṇo bhagavaṃs taiḥ saha saṅgataṃ tava // 38
K01vinv06_u:756: dharmajña nayajña pudgalajña tvāṃ vande ṣaḍabhijña sarvadaiva /
K01vinv06_u:757: kṣetrajña mune parāparajña tvāṃ vande śirasā nayānayajña // 39
K01vinv06_u:758: pṛthum api samīkṣate guṇaṃ tava parikathito hi mayā guṇaikadeśaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:760: na tava guṇamahārṇavasya pāraṃ jagati pumān adhigantum ārya śaktaḥ // 40
K01vinv06_u:762: ity evamādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ stotraśatair bhagavān abhiṣṭutaḥ {MS abhituṣṭaḥ} /
K01vinv06_u:763: tathābhiprasannasya ca bhagavatā nīlabhūter dharmo deśitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:764: yathā yathā tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:765: atha nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ stutvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:770: bhavanto na tv ahaṃ pūrvam avocam* /
K01vinv06_u:777: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya mathurāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K01vinv06_u:778: tena khalu samayena mathurāyāṃ nakṣatrarātraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:779: atha yā devatā mathurāyām adhyuṣitā tasyā etad abhavat* /
K01vinv06_u:781: mama nakṣatrarātrer antarāyaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā bhagavataḥ purastād vinagno 'sthāt* /
K01vinv06_u:783: apraticchannas tāvad devate mātṛgrāmo na śobhate prāg eva vinagna iti /
K01vinv06_u:784: atha sā devatā jihrīya nagnarūpā ekānte 'pakrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:785: tato bhagavān mārgād apakramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:791: atha bahagavān na praviśann eva mathurāṃ yena gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:792: upasaṃkramya gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam abhyavagāhyānyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya /
K01vinv06_u:793: aśrauṣur māthurā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavān piṇḍāya prāviśat* devatayā viheṭhitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:794: apraviśann eva mathurāṃ gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ gata iti śrutvā ca punaḥ śucinaḥ
K01vinv06_u:795: praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ sthālīpākaṃ samudānīya śakaṭe
K01vinv06_u:797: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:798: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān* śrāddhān māthurān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv06_u:799: atha śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:800: ihāsmābhir bhadanta bhagavantam uddiśya śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya śakaṭaṃ pūrṇam ānītam* /
K01vinv06_u:801: tad bhagavān pratigṛhṇātu anukampām upādāya iti /
K01vinv06_u:803: gacchānanda yāvanto bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam (fol. 145v1 = GBM 6.959)
K01vinv06_u:807: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvanto bhikṣavo gardabhasya
K01vinv06_u:808: yakṣasya bhavanam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena
K01vinv06_u:811: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:812: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam upaniśritya viharanti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:815: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:817: buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavad yāvad dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt tasthur āyācamānaṃ cāhuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:818: bhagavatā bhadanta te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāś ca vinītāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:819: ayaṃ bhadanta gardabhako yakṣo 'smākaṃ dīrgharātram avairiṇāṃ vairī /
K01vinv06_u:823: aho vata bhagavān gardabhakaṃ yakṣaṃ vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
K01vinv06_u:824: tena khalu samayena gardabhako yakṣas tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt sannipatitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:832: yadi mām uddiśya cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vihāraṃ kārayantīti /
K01vinv06_u:833: tatra bhagavān māthurān śrāddhān brahmaṇagṛhapatīn āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:837: tatra bhagavatā gardabhako yakṣaḥ pañcaśataparivāro vinītaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:838: śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhis tān uddiśya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni /
K01vinv06_u:839: evaṃ śaro yakṣo vano yakṣaḥ ālikāvendā maghā yakṣiṇī vinītā /
K01vinv06_u:840: atha bhagavatā ṛddhyā mathurāṃ praviśya timisikā {MS bhagavato bhagavān ṛddhyā vinītā} yakṣiṇī pañcaśataparivārā vinītā /
K01vinv06_u:842: tatra bhagavatā sāntarbahir mathurāyām ardhatṛtīyāni yakṣasahasrāṇi vinītāni /
K01vinv06_u:843: tāny uddiśya śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhir ardhatṛtīyāni vihārasahasrāṇi kāritāni /
K01vinv06_u:847: tatra otalāyano nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:848: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya otalāyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K01vinv06_u:851: adrākṣus te kārṣikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaṃ (fol. 146r1 = GBM 6.960)
K01vinv06_u:855: atha tad balīvardasahasraṃ yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi cchitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntam* /
K01vinv06_u:856: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā saṃparivāryāvatasthuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:857: bhagavatā teṣāṃ tribhiḥ padair dharmo deśito yāvac cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:859: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:860: kiṃ bhadanta ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ kārṣikaśatair ebhiś ca balīvardaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttā daridragṛheṣūpapannāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:863: ebhir evaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānīti vistaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:867: ebhiś ca balīvardais tatraiva pravrajitaiḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadair anādaraṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:869: yat te kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajitās tasya karmaṇo vipākena mamāntikāt satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti vistaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:871: aśrauṣīd otalāyano brāhmaṇaḥ śramaṇo gautamo otalām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:877: tena ca pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakaṃ saṃghaṃ bhojayitvā praṇidhānaṃ karoti /
K01vinv06_u:878: sa yac cintayati yat prārthayate tat sarvaṃ pratilabhate iti /
K01vinv06_u:879: atha otalāyano brāhmaṇaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:880: adhivāsayatu me bhagavan gautama śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K01vinv06_u:881: pūrvavad yāvad bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ cintayitum ārabdhaḥ
K01vinv06_u:882: yāvanta ime śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā mayā bhojitāḥ sarva ete mama balīvardāḥ syur iti /
K01vinv06_u:883: atha bhagavān otalāyanasya brāhmaṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya otalāyanaṃ brāhmaṇam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:886: tathā hy ete sarve bhikṣavaḥ kṣīṇapunarbhavāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:887: anyac cittam utpādayety uktvā bhagavān dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:888: atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gataḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:895: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayād otalāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣad āyuṣmatā ānandena paścācchramaṇena /
K01vinv06_u:898: bhagavāṃs tasya vinayakālam avekṣyāyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:901: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena kacaṃgalā vṛddhā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:906: tataḥ kacaṃgalā udakaghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā tvaritatvaritā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:907: dadarśa kacaṃgalā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K01vinv06_u:911: sā ūrdhvabāhuḥ putra putreti bhagavantaṃ pariṣvaṅktum ārabdhā /
K01vinv06_u:914: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ etāṃ vṛddhāṃ vārayata /
K01vinv06_u:916: pañca janmaśatāny eṣā me mātābhūn nirantaram* /
K01vinv06_u:917: sā ced eṣā nivāritā mama gātrasya śleṣaṇāt* //
K01vinv06_u:919: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kaṇṭhād eṣā vamet kṣaṇāt* /
K01vinv06_u:923: putrasnehaṃ vinodya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv06_u:924: tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
K01vinv06_u:925: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā kacaṃgalayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
K01vinv06_u:928: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā /
K01vinv06_u:930: anādyakālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:933: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā me 'dya cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam* //
K01vinv06_u:934: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca te aham* /
K01vinv06_u:935: sthāpitā suprayatnena sādhu te duṣkaraṃ kṛtam* //
K01vinv06_u:937: ity uktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:938: atha kacaṃgalā apareṇa samayena svāminam anujñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:939: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇā /
K01vinv06_u:941: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato (fol. 147r1 = GBM 6.962)
K01vinv06_u:944: tatas tayā pravrājitā upasaṃpāditā avavādo dattaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:945: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:948: yadā bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saṃkṣepeṇoddiśya vihāraṃ praviśati pratisaṃlayanāya tadā taṃ kacaṃgalā vistareṇa vyākaroti /
K01vinv06_u:950: eṣāgrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāṃ yaduta kacaṃgalā bhikṣuṇī iti /
K01vinv06_u:951: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:952: kiṃ bhadanta kacaṃgalāyāḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena vṛddhā pravrajitā /
K01vinv06_u:953: kiṃ ca karma kṛtaṃ yena daridrā dāsī ca saṃvṛttā bhagavāṃś ca paścimena garbhavāsena dhāritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:958: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv06_u:959: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ vartamānasya eṣā mama mātā babhūva /
K01vinv06_u:960: yadāhaṃ pravrajitum icchāmi tadā mām eva vārayati /
K01vinv06_u:964: na cānayā puṇyamaheśākhyasaṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yathā mahāmāyayā yenāham anayā paścime garbhavāsena dhāritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:965: kāśyape ca samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitā yāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣuṇyo dāsīvādena samudācaritāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:967: yat tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ
K01vinv06_u:968: pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena mama śāsane pravrajya
K01vinv06_u:970: yasyāś copādhyāyikāyāḥ sakāśe pravrajitā sā bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:971: tatrānayā maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvad āyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ na ca kaścid guṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:972: anena kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛto bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:973: tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhat samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
K01vinv06_u:975: (MSV I 24) yathaiṣā me upādhyāyikā bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:976: (fol. 147v1 = GBM 6.963) evaṃ mām apy asau bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sūtravibhāgakartrīṇām agrāṃ nirdiśed iti /
K01vinv06_u:977: tat praṇidhānavaśād etarhi mayā sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:978: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:981: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:984: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
K01vinv06_u:985: atha bhagavān saṃprasthito yāvad anyatamasminn ārāme /
K01vinv06_u:988: adrākṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva /
K01vinv06_u:992: tato rajjuṃ tipyakaṃ ca gopāyitvā sthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:994: pāṃcikena ca mahāyakṣasenāpatinā tad udapānaṃ plāvīkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:996: tato 'sau brāhmaṇo mahardhiko 'yaṃ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti viditvātiprasannaḥ kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:1000: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:1001: kiṃ kuryād udapānena āpaś cet sarvato yadi /
K01vinv06_u:1002: chitveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇāṃ caret* // iti //
K01vinv06_u:1004: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavad yāvat* /
K01vinv06_u:1006: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭīparītadehaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1007: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau naiva sthito buddhamanorathena //
K01vinv06_u:1010: tenodyacchamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1012: traidhātukavītarāgaḥ pūrvavad yāvad abhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1013: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vairaṃbhyam anuprāpto vairaṃbhye viharati naḍerapicumandamūle /
K01vinv06_u:1014: tena khalu samayena vairaṃbhyeṣv agnidatto nāma brāhmaṇarājo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:1015: aśrauṣīd agnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vairaṃbhyam anuprāpto vairaṃbhye viharati naḍerapicumandamūle (MSV I 26) iti /
K01vinv06_u:1017: śramaṇo gautamaḥ sarvasāmantarājānāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhatsaṃmataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1018: saced ahaṃ śramanaṃ gautamaṃ na satkariṣyāmi prātisīmānāṃ koṭṭarājānāṃ garhyo bhaviṣyāmi /
K01vinv06_u:1019: bālo vata bhavanto 'gnidatto brāhmaṇarājo yasya grāmakṣetram upaniśritya śramaṇo gautamo viharati na ca satkaroti /
K01vinv06_u:1020: (fol. 148r1 = GBM 6.964) yanv ahaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ
K01vinv06_u:1021: pravārayeyam iti viditvā mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena vairaṃbhyān niṣkramya
K01vinv06_u:1023: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1024: ekāntaniṣaṇṇam agnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv06_u:1025: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarāja utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1026: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān gautamas traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti /
K01vinv06_u:1028: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1029: tena niveśanaṃ gatvā amātyānām ājñā dattā /
K01vinv06_u:1030: pratidivasam aṣṭādaśaprakāraṃ khādyakaṃ pacata nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ ca prabhūtaṃ bhaktam* /
K01vinv06_u:1033: yo bhojayati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv06_u:1036: ātmīyair antraiḥ {MS ātmadīyair antraiḥ} sarvaṃ vairaṃbhyaṃ nagaraṃ veṣṭitam* /
K01vinv06_u:1037: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaḥ saṃtaptaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghu laghv eva mahārhaśayanād utthāya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1038: mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāya iti /
K01vinv06_u:1039: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa /
K01vinv06_u:1044: yady aham enam anusaṃvarṇayeyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā śramaṇo gautamaḥ prasādam utpādayiṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:1045: yanv aham enaṃ vivarṇayeyeam iti viditvā kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:1048: niyataṃ devasya rājyacyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1050: aho vata me na rājyacyutiḥ syād vā jīvitasyāntarāya iti viditvā brāhmaṇaṃ purohitam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1051: upādhyāya ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yena me na rājyacyutir bhaven nāpi jīvitasyāntarāya iti /
K01vinv06_u:1053: yadi devas traimāsīm adarśanapathe tiṣṭhati evaṃ devasya na rājyacyutir
K01vinv06_u:1059: na (fol. 148v1 = GBM 6.965) mama kenacit traimāsīṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1060: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv06_u:1063: āyuṣmān ānandaḥ kālyam evotthāya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1064: yāvat paśyaty agnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya pauruṣeyā alpotsukān kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti /
K01vinv06_u:1069: na tv agnidattena brāhmaṇarājena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghas traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1070: te yūyam alpotsukās tiṣṭhatha nāhāraṃ sajjīkurutha nāsanaprajñaptim* /
K01vinv06_u:1074: paṃcānāṃ śatānām āhāraṃ sajjīkuruta praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ ceti /
K01vinv06_u:1079: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv06_u:1085: gacchānanda saṃghāṭīm ādāya paścācchramaṇaṃ ca vairaṃbhye rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv ārocaya /
K01vinv06_u:1086: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavantaḥ utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ bhojayatv iti /
K01vinv06_u:1087: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīm ādāya paścācchramaṇaṃ ca rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv ārocayati /
K01vinv06_u:1088: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavantaḥ utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ sa bhojayatv iti /
K01vinv06_u:1092: api tu anena kalirājena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam* /
K01vinv06_u:1093: nānyena kenacit traimāsīm upanimaṃtrya buddhapramuko bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1094: yo bhojayati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv06_u:1095: yāvad uttarāpathāt sārthavāhaḥ paṃcāśvaśatāni paṇyam ādāya vairaṃbhyam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1097: yad idānīṃ gamiṣyāmi aśvānāṃ khuraḥ kledam āpatsyate /
K01vinv06_u:1103: śrutaṃ cānena rājñā ayaṃ cāyaṃ ca kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1109: āryānanda mayā aśvājāneyasya dvau yavaprasthau prajñaptau /
K01vinv06_u:1111: yadi bhagavān utsahate yavān paribhoktum ahaṃ bhagavataḥ prasthadvayam anuprayacchāmi /
K01vinv06_u:1116: mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāni /
K01vinv06_u:1117: avaśyaṃbhāvīni mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:1118: na hi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante /
K01vinv06_u:1122: pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām iti /
K01vinv06_u:1124: gacchānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ śalākāṃ {Dutt throughout śilākāṃ} cāraya /
K01vinv06_u:1125: yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktuṃ sa śalākāṃ gṛhṇātv iti /
K01vinv06_u:1126: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṃ cārayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1127: yāvad bhagavatā śalākāṃ gṛhītvā bhikṣudvayonaiś ca pāṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1129: bhagavann ahaṃ vāyvābādhiko notsahe traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktum iti /
K01vinv06_u:1132: tato bhagavān bhikṣudvayaunaiḥ paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye varṣā upagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1133: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau triśaṅkuṃ parvataṃ gatvā varṣā upagatau /
K01vinv06_u:1134: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa divyayā sudhayā pravāritau /
K01vinv06_u:1135: tataḥ sārthavāho bhagavato dvau yavaprasthāv anuprayacchati /
K01vinv06_u:1137: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1139: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaṃśam ādāya yenānyatamā vṛddhā strī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1149: bhagini śakṣyasi tvaṃ tathāgatasyārthāya yavān parikarmīkartum iti /
K01vinv06_u:1159: yady aham asyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kariṣye (fol. 149v1 = GBM 6.967)
K01vinv06_u:1160: gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yad asau na vijñāsyatīti yanv aham asyāś cakraratnavarṇodāharaṇam udāhareyam iti viditvā kathayati
K01vinv06_u:1161: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1164: cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasya saptamasya /
K01vinv06_u:1165: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1166: iha bhagini rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātopavāsair
K01vinv06_u:1167: alaṃkṛtasya upari prāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ
K01vinv06_u:1168: prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ (MSV I 32)
K01vinv06_u:1171: yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ pūrvavad yāvat sarvasauvarṇam* /
K01vinv06_u:1173: addhāham asmi rājā cakravartīti cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāma utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ
K01vinv06_u:1174: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tac cakraratnam ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ
K01vinv06_u:1175: pratigṛhya vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā anuvartayati /
K01vinv06_u:1176: jayasva bho cakraratna yenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipatha iti /
K01vinv06_u:1177: atha cakraratnaṃ rājñā cakravartinā anupravartitam uparivihāyasam abhyudgamya pūrveṇa prāyāsīdyenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipathaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1178: anveti rājā cakravartī tac cakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv06_u:1179: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe tac cakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv06_u:1180: ye khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi koṭṭarājānas te yena rājā cakravartī tenopasaṃkrāmanti /
K01vinv06_u:1184: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāś ca sphītāś ca kṣemāś ca subhikṣāś cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tān devaḥ samanuśāstu /
K01vinv06_u:1186: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha (MSV I 33)
K01vinv06_u:1188: mā ca vaḥ kasyacid adharmacāriṇo vipaccāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso rocatām* /
K01vinv06_u:1190: atha tac cakraratnaṃ pūrvāṃ diśam abhinirjitya pūrvavan mahāsamudraṃ pratyuttīrya dakṣiṇena paścimenottareṇa prāyāsīd yenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipathaḥ
K01vinv06_u:1191: atha cakraratnaṃ rājñā cakravartinānupravartitam upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya uttareṇānvāvṛtaṃ yenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipathaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1192: anveti rājā cakravartī tac cakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena (fol. 150r1 = GBM 6.968) /
K01vinv06_u:1193: yasmin pradeśe tac cakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv06_u:1194: ye khalūttarasyāṃ diśi koṭṭarājānaḥ te yena rājā cakravartī tenopasaṃkrāmanti /
K01vinv06_u:1198: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāś ca sphītāś ca kṣemāś ca subhikṣāś cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca /
K01vinv06_u:1201: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa /
K01vinv06_u:1202: mā ca vaḥ kasyacid adharmacāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso rocatām iti /
K01vinv06_u:1204: pratyuttīrya tām eva rājadhānīm āgatyoparyasyādhikaraṇasyocchrāpitam ivāsthāt* /
K01vinv06_u:1206: loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1207: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1208: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartino hastī bhavati sarvaśvetaḥ kumudavarṇaḥ saptāṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhito 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1209: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājñaś cakravartinaś cittam abhiprasīdati /
K01vinv06_u:1210: bhadrakaṃ varahastiratnaṃ sakṛd damatham (fol. 150v1 = GBM 6.969) eṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:1211: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātaṃ hastidamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1212: idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātaṃ hastiratnaṃ kṣipram eva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākam upanayitavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1213: evaṃ deva iti saṃkhyāto hastidamako rājñaś cakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya hastiratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkrāmati /
K01vinv06_u:1214: tadekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv06_u:1215: tadyathānye hastino 'nekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānaṃ pratigṛhṇanti /
K01vinv06_u:1216: evam etad dhastiratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv06_u:1217: dāntaṃ cainaṃ viditvā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ upanāmayati /
K01vinv06_u:1220: atha rājā cakravartī tad dhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye
K01vinv06_u:1221: tad dhi hastiratnam abhiruhyemām eva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍya tām
K01vinv06_u:1224: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1225: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1226: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartinaḥ aśvo bhavati sarvanīlaḥ kṛṣṇaśirā manojño javano 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1227: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājñaś cakravartinaś cittam abhiprasīdati /
K01vinv06_u:1229: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātam aśvadamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1230: idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātam aśvaratnaṃ kṣipram eva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākam upanayitavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1231: evaṃ deveti saṃkhyāto 'śvadamako rājñaś cakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya tad aśvaratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇair upasaṃkrāmati /
K01vinv06_u:1232: tadekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv06_u:1233: tadyathānye aśvā anekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānāḥ sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti /
K01vinv06_u:1234: evam eva tad aśvaratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv06_u:1235: dāntaṃ cainaṃ viditvā rājñaś cakravartina upanāmayati /
K01vinv06_u:1236: dāntaṃ deva bhadram aśvaratnaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate /
K01vinv06_u:1237: atha rājā cakravartī aśvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye tad
K01vinv06_u:1238: aśvaratnam abhiruhyemām eva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍya tām eva rājadhānīm āgatya (MSV I 36)
K01vinv06_u:1240: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1241: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya maṇiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1242: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartino maṇir bhavati aṣṭāṃśo vaiḍūryaḥ śubho jātimānaccho viprasannaḥ anāvilaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1243: yāvad rājñaś cakravartino 'ntaḥpure dīpakṛtyaṃ sarvaṃ tanmaṇer ābhayā /
K01vinv06_u:1244: atha rājā cakravartī tan maṇiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo 'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātryāṃ śanair
K01vinv06_u:1245: mandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyutsu niścarantīṣu maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropyodyānabhūmiṃ
K01vinv06_u:1247: yāvat khalu rājñaś cakravartino caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ sarvaḥ sphuṭo maṇer ābhayā /
K01vinv06_u:1249: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya maṇiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1250: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya strīratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:1251: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strī bhavati abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikī nātigaurī
K01vinv06_u:1252: nātiśyāmā madgurucchavir nātidīrghā nātihrasvā supratiṣṭhitā nātikṛśā nātisthūlā
K01vinv06_u:1254: tasyāḥ khalu bhagini śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi uṣṇe śītasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi kāliṅgaprāvāramṛdusaṃsparśāni /
K01vinv06_u:1255: tasyāḥ khalu bhagini sarvaromakūpebhyaś candanagandho vāti mukhāc ca utpalagandhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1257: yāvad āyuṣmān ānandaḥ strīratnaṃ vibhajati tāvat tayā dārikayā te yāvaḥ parikarmitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1258: sā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhā (fol. 151r1 = GBM 6.970) /
K01vinv06_u:1259: ārya anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnaṃ syām iti /
K01vinv06_u:1260: athāyuṣmān ānando yavān parikarmitān ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1266: kim abhūt te ānanda tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1267: tena hy ānanda yāvāṃs te 'bhūt tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvam asmākaṃ vistareṇārocaya /
K01vinv06_u:1268: athāyuṣmān ānando yat tasyābhūt tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ bhagavato vistareṇārocayati /
K01vinv06_u:1269: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1270: kasmāt tvayānanda tayā dārikayā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ na kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1272: gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yad asau dārikā na vijñāsyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:1275: sacet tvayā tasyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtam abhaviṣyat sthānam etad vidyate yat tu yām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartikaṃ cittam utpāditam abhaviṣyat* /
K01vinv06_u:1276: api tv ānanda bhaviṣyaty asau dārikā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnam* /
K01vinv06_u:1278: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ paṭaplotikaṃ prāvṛtyāntargṛhaṃ gacchati /
K01vinv06_u:1279: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā paṭaplotiṃ prāvṛtyāntargṛhaṃ gantavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1284: sā bhagavatā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnaṃ vyākṛtā /
K01vinv06_u:1285: iti śrutvā yaiḥ paṃcabhir dārikāśatair dvyūnair bhikṣudvayonānāṃ paṃcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ yavāḥ parikarmitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1288: yāvad bhagavān yavān paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ āyuṣmān ānando viklavaḥ aśrūṇi pramoktum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1289: bhagavatā teṣu janmaparivarteṣu karacaraṇaśiraśchedādīni dānāni datvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvam avāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavān bhakṣayatīti
K01vinv06_u:1291: kasmāt tvam ānanda viklavaḥ aśrūṇi pramuṃcasi /
K01vinv06_u:1292: bhagavān bhadanta cakravartikule jāto rājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ karacaraṇaśirādīni dānāni datvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvam avāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavān bhakṣayatīti /
K01vinv06_u:1294: ākāṃkṣasi tvam ānanda tathāgatasya daṃṣṭrāntaravinirgatān yavān paribhoktum* /
K01vinv06_u:1296: tato bhagavatā āyuṣmata ānandāya daṃṣṭrāntaravinirgatānāṃ (fol. 151v1 = GBM 6.971)
K01vinv06_u:1300: yadi tathāgataḥ prākṛtam apy āhāraṃ paribhuṃkte tad api tathāgatasyānnaśatarasaṃ saṃparivartate /
K01vinv06_u:1302: agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavān vairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti /
K01vinv06_u:1303: sāmantarājair api śrutaṃ tair agnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1304: te praveśaṃ na labhante dvāri sthitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1305: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutaṃ tena paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūṭhasya śāleḥ preṣitāni /
K01vinv06_u:1307: bahuśo mayā śramaṇo gautamo viheṭhito na kadācid avatāro labdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1308: atrāpi tāvad asya praharāmi iti viditvā āyuṣmantam ānandam ātmānaṃ vinirmāya teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ śakaṭaśatānāṃ purataḥ sthitvā kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:1311: ārya ānanda agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavān vairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti /
K01vinv06_u:1312: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutvaitāni parṇopagūṭhasya śāler bhagavato 'rthāya paṃca śakaṭaśatāni preṣitāni iti /
K01vinv06_u:1315: yadi bhagavān ākāśe pātraṃ prasārayati tad api devās trayastriṃśā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pūrayanti /
K01vinv06_u:1319: āryānanda saṃprasthitā vayaṃ kim idānīṃ nivartāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1324: sa uparivihāyasam abhyudgamya akṣamātrābhir vāridhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1325: tena tāvad dṛṣṭaṃ yāvat tāni śakaṭāni nābhiṃ yāvan nimagnāni /
K01vinv06_u:1326: tatas te śākaṭikā balīvardān muktvā prakrāntā iti /
K01vinv06_u:1327: tatra bhagavatā vairaṃbhye yavāḥ paribhuktāḥ sārdhaṃ dvayonaiḥ paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1328: āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ triśaṃkuke parvate varṣopagatābhyāṃ divyā sudhā paribhuktā /
K01vinv06_u:1329: tatas tena sārthavāhena traimāsasyātyayād bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimaṃtritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1331: sa sārthavāhas tām eva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya pūrvavad
K01vinv06_u:1332: yāvad bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor
K01vinv06_u:1334: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī aśvājāneyaḥ putro yuvarājas tāny api paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃca putraśatāni /
K01vinv06_u:1335: (fol. 152r1 = GBM 6.972) yā sā dārikā bhagavatā strīratnaṃ yāni paṃca dārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti /
K01vinv06_u:1336: tato bhagavāṃs tasya sārthavāhasya cetasā cittam ājñāya taṃ sārthavāham idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1337: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ sārthavāha rājā cakravartī aśvājāneyas te putro yuvarājas tāny api paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃca putraśatāni /
K01vinv06_u:1339: tāny api dvyūnāni paṃca dārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti /
K01vinv06_u:1340: atha bhagavān traimāsasyātyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:1347: āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1348: tena khalu samayenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ puṇyāham āgamayaṃs tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:1350: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājas tenopasaṃkrama /
K01vinv06_u:1352: ānando bhikṣur dvāre tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti /
K01vinv06_u:1353: evam ārya iti dauvārikapuruṣaḥ āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1355: devāryānando bhikṣur dvāre tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1357: ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa puṇyāham āgamayaṃs tiṣṭhāmi /
K01vinv06_u:1361: nāmakalyāṇo rūpakalyāṇo varṇakalyāṇaḥ pratibhānakalyāṇaḥ pratipattikalyāṇaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:1363: dauvārikeṇāyuṣmata ānandāyaivam ārocitam* āyuṣmān ānandaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1364: te 'pi sāmantarājānāṃ dūtās tenaiva sārdhaṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1366: athāyuṣmān ānando 'gnidattaṃ brāhamaṇarājam ārogyayitvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1367: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ āyuṣmān ānando 'gnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1368: bhagavāṃs te mahārāja ārogyayati kathayati ca /
K01vinv06_u:1369: uṣitāḥ smo mahārāja tava vijite traimāsīm* /
K01vinv06_u:1373: kaccid āryānanda bhagavān vairaṃbhyeṣu janapadeṣu sukhaṃ varṣoṣitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1376: devo 'pratyakṣitarājyas tvaṃ yo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīm upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1379: satyam āryānanda bhagavatā traimāsīṃ yavāḥ paribhuktāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1382: pṛthivyāṃ nipatito mahatā jalapariṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇaḥ amātyān āhūya pṛcchati /
K01vinv06_u:1383: bhavanto na mayā yuṣmākam ājñā dattā /
K01vinv06_u:1388: na tv ājñā dattā amukasya dātavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1389: api tu adyāpy āhāraḥ sajjīkṛta eva /
K01vinv06_u:1391: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1392: ekāntaniṣaṇṇam agnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv06_u:1393: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1394: (MSV I 43) atyayo bhagavann atyayaḥ sugata yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīm upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1395: tasya mama bhagavann atyayaṃ jānato 'tyayaṃ paśyataḥ atyayam atyayataḥ pratigṛhṇīṣvānukampām upādāya /
K01vinv06_u:1396: tathyaṃ te mahārāja atyayam atyayata āgamā yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yas tvaṃ tathāgataṃ traimāsīm upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1397: yatas tvaṃ mahārāja atyayaṃ jānāsy atyayaṃ paśyasi taṃ ca dṛṣṭvādeśayasi vṛddhir eva te pratikāṃkṣitavyā
K01vinv06_u:1400: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv06_u:1402: tathāgato mahārāja alpāyuṣke kāle jātaḥ prabhūtaṃ ca kāryaṃ karaṇīyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1405: yady evam adhivāsayatu me bhagavān saptavarṣāṇi saptamāsān saptadivasān* /
K01vinv06_u:1408: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv06_u:1410: yady aham asyaikabhaktakam api nādhivāsayāmi sthānam etad vidyate yady agnidatto brāhmaṇarāja uṣṇaṃ (MSV I 44)
K01vinv06_u:1411: śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena /
K01vinv06_u:1412: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1413: upasaṃkramyāmātyān āmaṃtrayate bhavantaḥ ko 'sau upāyaḥ syād yena sarvo 'yam āhāro buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhukto bhaved iti /
K01vinv06_u:1419: bhavanto yāvān ayam āhāraḥ sarvam etat samantāt pṛthivyām ākirata iti /
K01vinv06_u:1421: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājas tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya pūrvavad yāvad bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1422: yāvad anyatamena mahallena saṃjātāmarṣeṇāsmābhis traimāsīṃ koṭarayavāḥ paribhuktāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1423: idānīm ayaṃ kalirājo vibhavaṃ darśayatīti viditvā khādanīyabhojanīyasya pṛthivyām ākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1430: mukhābhyavahāryaṃ pādena spṛśantīti viditvā bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
K01vinv06_u:1431: amukena bhikṣavo mahallabhikṣuṇā saṃjātāmarṣeṇa khādanīyabhojanīyasya mukhābhyavahāryasya pṛthivyām ākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro datta iti /
K01vinv06_u:1433: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ mukhābhyavahāryaṃ pādenākramitavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1435: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā
K01vinv06_u:1436: śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati pūrvavad yāvad dhautahastam
K01vinv06_u:1437: apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv06_u:1438: atha bhagavān agnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
K01vinv06_u:1439: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1440: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavas trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ
K01vinv06_u:1441: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthur /
K01vinv06_u:1442: ekāntasthitāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan* /
K01vinv06_u:1444: {Tib. inserts the whole Vairambhasūtra; cf. AN II 54-57}
K01vinv06_u:1446: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ (MSV I 46)
K01vinv06_u:1448: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yena karacaraṇaśiraśchedādinā dānasaṃbhāreṇa yāvad
K01vinv06_u:1449: dīnajanaṃ saṃtarpya kalpāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yat trayaṃ satvārthe ātmānaṃ parikhedyāpagatasarvakāryo
K01vinv06_u:1450: vairaṃbhye koṭarayavān paribhuktavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣudvyūnaiḥ paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1454: tathāgatenaiva etāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv06_u:1455: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
K01vinv06_u:1456: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
K01vinv06_u:1458: saḥ aśītibhikṣusahasraparivāro bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati /
K01vinv06_u:1459: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ pāñcaśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ brāhmaṇakān maṃtrān pāṭhayati /
K01vinv06_u:1460: sarvalokasya cātyarthaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhat saṃmataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1461: yata eva vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptas tata eva taṃ na kaścit satkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati /
K01vinv06_u:1464: yāvat saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bandhumatīṃ (MSV I 47)
K01vinv06_u:1466: tato nānāsūpikarasopetasya bhaktasya pātrāṇi pūrayitvā nirgacchanti /
K01vinv06_u:1467: tena ca brāhmaṇena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca /
K01vinv06_u:1468: bho bhikṣavaḥ paśyāmi kīdṛśaḥ piṇḍapāto labdha iti /
K01vinv06_u:1471: nārhantīme muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum* /
K01vinv06_u:1475: nārhanty eva ime muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum* /
K01vinv06_u:1477: tatra ca dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadrau kalyāṇāśayau /
K01vinv06_u:1480: mahātmāna ete 'rhanty eva divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhoktuṃ na koṭarayavān iti /
K01vinv06_u:1482: yo 'sau vipaśyitathāgatena gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:1483: yāni tāni dvyūnāni paṃca māṇavakaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni /
K01vinv06_u:1484: yau tau dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadrau kalyāṇāśayau etāv eva tau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū /
K01vinv06_u:1485: yan mayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇām antike cittaṃ pradūṣya
K01vinv06_u:1486: kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ dvyūnaiś ca paṃcabhir māṇavakaśatair anumoditaṃ dvābhyāṃ
K01vinv06_u:1487: tu nānumoditaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenaitarhi tathāgatena vairaṃbhye koṭarayavāḥ paribhuktāḥ (MSV I 48)
K01vinv06_u:1491: karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1493: {Mark Allon 2003: Parallel see SN IV 179-181} tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma /
K01vinv06_u:1495: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
K01vinv06_u:1496: atha bhagavān dakṣiṇapaṃcāle janapadacārikāṃ carann ayodhyām anuprāptaḥ ayodhyāyāṃ viharati nadyā gaṃgāyās tīre /
K01vinv06_u:1499: ekāntasthitaḥ sa bhikṣur bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1500: sādhu me bhagavaṃs tathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntike saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vihareyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1501: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā viharan yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv
K01vinv06_u:1502: avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti
K01vinv06_u:1503: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayeyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1504: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:1505: evam ukte bhagavān yena gaṃgā nadī tena vyavalokayan vyavalokayati /
K01vinv06_u:1506: adrākṣīd bhagavān nadyā gaṃgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandham uhyamānam* /
K01vinv06_u:1507: dṛṣṭvā ca punas taṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:1508: paśyasi tvaṃ bhikṣo nadyā gaṃgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandham uhyamānam* (MSV I 49) /
K01vinv06_u:1509: evaṃ bhadanta saced eṣa na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:1517: evam eṣa bhikṣo dāruskandho 'nupūrveṇa samudranimno bhaviṣyati samudrapravaṇaḥ samudraprāgbhāraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1518: evam eva sacet tvaṃ bhikṣo na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi /
K01vinv06_u:1521: evaṃ hi tvaṃ bhikṣo anupūrveṇa nirvāṇanimno bhaviṣyasi nirvāṇapravaṇo nirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1522: nāhaṃ bhadanta jāne kim apārimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīram* / kiṃ madhye
K01vinv06_u:1529: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā pūrvavad yāvan nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:1530: apārimaṃ tīram iti bhikṣo ṣaṇṇām ādhyātmikānām āyatanānām etad adhivacanam* /
K01vinv06_u:1531: pārimaṃ tīram iti ṣaṇṇāṃ bāhyānām āyatanānām etad adhivacanam* /
K01vinv06_u:1537: sa sukhiteṣu sukhito duḥkhiteṣu dukhitaḥ utpannotpanneṣu kiṃ karaṇīyeṣu samādāya paryavasānānuvartī bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:1538: amanuṣyagrāha iti yathāpīhaika iti praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ caratīty anenāhaṃ śīlena vā vratena vā tapena vā brahmacaryavāsena vā syāṃ devo devānyatamo veti /
K01vinv06_u:1539: āvartagrāha iti yathāpīhaikaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvartate /
K01vinv06_u:1540: antaḥpūtībhāva iti yathāpīhaiko duḥśīlo bhavati pāpadharmā antaḥpūtir avasrutaḥ kaṣaṃvakajātaḥ śaṃkhasvarasamācāraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1542: evaṃ hi sacet tvaṃ bhikṣo nāpārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi pūrvavad yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1543: atha sa bhikṣur bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1544: atha sa bhikṣur bhagavatā anena dāruskandhopamenāvavādenāvavāditaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1545: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā viharan yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy
K01vinv06_u:1546: avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchadya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti
K01vinv06_u:1547: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya
K01vinv06_u:1548: pravedayate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ
K01vinv06_u:1552: tena khalu samayena nando gopālako bhagavato nātidūre sthito 'bhūt* /
K01vinv06_u:1554: tena daṇḍenāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ saṃchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu cittam
K01vinv06_u:1555: utpādayati yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ vā cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ syād atonidānaṃ nandasya
K01vinv06_u:1556: gopālasya kathāvyākṣepam iti viditvā bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś
K01vinv06_u:1558: atha nando gopālako daṇḍam ekānte upanikṣipya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1560: ekāntasthito nando gopālako bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1567: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1568: tena hi nandena svāmināṃ gāvo dattāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1571: bhadanta gāvas taruṇavatsā jñāsyanti svakasvakāni gokulāni /
K01vinv06_u:1573: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ (fol. 155r1 = GBM 6.978)
K01vinv06_u:1575: kiṃ cāpi nanda daharā gāvas taruṇavatsā jñāsyanti svakasvakāni gokulāni /
K01vinv06_u:1577: api tu karaṇīyam etad gopālakena yathāpi tat svāminā bhaktācchādanaṃ svīkurvatā /
K01vinv06_u:1579: atha nando gopālako bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1580: tato bhayaṃ bhayam ity uccaiḥ śabdaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pradhāvitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1586: tān dṛṣṭvā anye 'pi gopālakā aśvapālakās tṛṇahārakāḥ kāṣṭḥahārakāḥ pathājīvā utpathājīvāś ca manuṣyāḥ pradhāvitum ārabdhāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1595: tataś cāsau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyas taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā itaś cāmutaś ca santrastāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1606: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān śāriputras tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt sannipatitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1607: athāyuṣmān śāriputraś ciraprakrāntaṃ nandaṃ gopālakaṃ viditvā bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1608: kasmād bhadanta bhagavatā nando gopālakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitukāmaḥ punar apy agārāyodyojitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1609: asthānam etac chāriputrānavakāśo yan nando gopālakaḥ punar api gṛhī agāram adhyāvatsyati sannidhikāraparibhoge (MSV I 53)
K01vinv06_u:1612: idānīṃ nando gopālakaḥ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā āgamiṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:1613: sa yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva
K01vinv06_u:1614: śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa
K01vinv06_u:1615: eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ
K01vinv06_u:1616: brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:1617: athāpareṇa samayena nando gopālakaḥ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā paṃcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1620: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam (fol. 155v1 = GBM 6.979)
K01vinv06_u:1622: labdhavān nando gopālakaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K01vinv06_u:1623: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān pūrvavad yāvat suvimuktacittaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1624: dharmatā aciropapannasya devaputrasya devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittāny utpadyante /
K01vinv06_u:1629: tiryagbhyaś cyutaś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapanno bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasādyeti /
K01vinv06_u:1631: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam* /
K01vinv06_u:1632: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1633: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharaḥ pūrvavad yāvat sarvaṃ gaṃgātīram udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair (MSV I 54)
K01vinv06_u:1635: atha bhagavān maṇḍūkapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*
K01vinv06_u:1636: yāṃ śrutvā pūrvavad yāvad anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1638: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:1639: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam* /
K01vinv06_u:1640: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kārṣakaḥ śūra
K01vinv06_u:1641: iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas
K01vinv06_u:1646: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1647: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro na catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1648: api tu nandena gopālena daṇḍena vāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ sa cchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu
K01vinv06_u:1649: sandhiṣu mā nandasya gopālakasya dharmavikṣepo bhaviṣyatīti niścalas tūṣṇīm avasthito
K01vinv06_u:1650: mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1655: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1656: kiṃ bhadanta nandena gopālena paṃcaśataparivāreṇa karma kṛtaṃ yena gopālakeṣūpapanno bhagavataś ca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ (fol. 156r1 = GBM 6.980)
K01vinv06_u:1658: maṇḍūkapūrviṇā devaputreṇa kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena maṇḍūkeṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1660: tenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv06_u:1661: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi /
K01vinv06_u:1662: pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upanisṛtya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve /
K01vinv06_u:1668: tayor apareṇa samayena parasparam adhikaraṇam utpannam* /
K01vinv06_u:1669: tāv arthārthinau tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntau pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1670: idaṃ cedaṃ cāvayor adhikaraṇam utpannaṃ vyupaśamayeti /
K01vinv06_u:1672: yady aham anayor adyaivādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayiṣyāmi arthārthināv etau na bhūya upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1673: tena sarvasaṃghaṃ saṃnipātya tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghamadhye upanikṣipya na ekāntīkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1674: ataḥ parasminn api divase tasya karvaṭake karaṇīyam utpannam* /
K01vinv06_u:1676: tatas tābhyāṃ cirayatīti saṃghaṃ saṃnipātya tad adhikaraṇam upanikṣiptam* /
K01vinv06_u:1678: yāvad asau tripiṭo bhikṣus tasmāt karvaṭakād āgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1687: jñāyate āyuṣmanto gopālakair yathā tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1688: tair apy anusaṃvarṇitam eva me tad upādhyāya gopālakair yathā tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1689: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tripiṭo bhikṣur eṣa evāsau nando gopālakas tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:1690: yāny asya tāni paṃca sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikānāṃ śatāni etāny eva paṃca gopālakaśatāni /
K01vinv06_u:1691: yad anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakasaṃgho gopālakavādena samudācaritaḥ
K01vinv06_u:1692: sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikaiś cānusaṃvarṇitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni
K01vinv06_u:1694: yāvad etarhy api paṃcaśataparivāro gopālakeṣv evopapannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1695: yad anena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ
K01vinv06_u:1696: ca kṛtaṃ tenaitarhi paṃcaśataparivāreṇa mama śāsane pravrajya (fol. 156v1 = GBM 6.981)
K01vinv06_u:1698: maṇḍūkapūrvy api devaputraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane bhikṣur āsīt* /
K01vinv06_u:1699: prāhāṇikaḥ sa janapadacārikāṃ caran anyatamasmin karvaṭake vihāram anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1700: sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā (MSV I 57)
K01vinv06_u:1707: sa madhyame yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvad anye bhikṣavaḥ svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti /
K01vinv06_u:1709: sa paścime yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvad apare svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti /
K01vinv06_u:1712: ime śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyā maṇḍūkā iva kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ raṭitā iti /
K01vinv06_u:1713: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau prāhāṇiko bhikṣur eṣa evāsau maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1714: yad anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakā maṇḍūkavādena samudācaritāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1715: tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni maṇḍūkeṣūpapanno yāvad etarhy api maṇḍūkeṣv evopapannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1716: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1717: yat kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ tenedānīṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1718: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1719: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:1720: atha bhagavān nadīṃ gaṃgām avatīrṇas tatra paṃcabhir haṃsamatsyakūrmaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:1721: teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padair dharmaḥ (MSV I 58) deśitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1728: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syād yad vayaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt tribhiḥ padair dharmaṃ śrutvā āhāram āharema iti /
K01vinv06_u:1732: dharmatā khalv aciropapannasya devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittāny utpadyante /
K01vinv06_u:1739: pūrvavad yāvan mandārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā bhagavatsāmantakena nadīṃ gaṃgām avabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair ākīrya bhagavatsāmantakenānuparivāryāvasthitāḥ
K01vinv06_u:1740: bhagavatā teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā pūrvavad (fol. 157r1 = GBM 6.982)
K01vinv06_u:1741: yāvad anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:1744: ete vayaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇam gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:1747: atha te (MSV I 59) matsyakacchapahaṃsapūrviṇo devaputrā vaṇija iva labdhalābhāḥ pūrvavad yāvat svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1748: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:1749: kiṃ bhadanta ebhir haṃsakacchapamatsyaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena haṃsakacchapamatsyeṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti /
K01vinv06_u:1751: ebhir eva bhikṣavo haṃsamatsyakacchapaiḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām*
K01vinv06_u:1752: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
K01vinv06_u:1753: kaśyapo nāma śāstā loke udapādi pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśṛtya viharati
K01vinv06_u:1758: yan mamāntike cittam abhiprasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannāḥ /
