K01vinv06_u:2063: kiṃ bhadanta ebhiḥ kārṣikapūrvakaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttā bhagavataś ca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:2064: tair balīvardapūrvakair devaputraiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena balīvardeṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2066: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti dehināṃ* /
K01vinv06_u:2067: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kaśyapo nāma śāstā loke udapādi /
K01vinv06_u:2068: pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśṛtya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve /
K01vinv06_u:2069: tasya śāsane etāni paṃca kārṣikaśatāni pravrajitāny abhūvan* /
K01vinv06_u:2070: tatra ebhir na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ na manasikāro vāhitaḥ kin tu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenātināmitam* /
K01vinv06_u:2071: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni etāni paṃca kārṣikaśatāni /
K01vinv06_u:2072: yo 'sau vihārasvāmī sa evāsau (MSV I 73) gṛhapatiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2073: yad ete kārṣikā yad ebhir vihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ
K01vinv06_u:2074: na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vāhitaḥ kin tu saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenātināmitaṃ
K01vinv06_u:2075: tena karmaṇā paṃca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2076: yāvad etarhy api tasyaiva kārṣikā jātāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2077: yad ebhiḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
K01vinv06_u:2078: te 'pi balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasyaiva samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsaṃs tatraiva kṣudrānukṣudrāṇi śikṣāpadāni khaṇḍitāni
K01vinv06_u:2080: yan mamāntike cittam abhiprasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2081: yat kāsyape samyaksaṃbudde brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ pratipālitaṃ tenedānīṃ devaputrabhūtaiḥ (fol. 161r1 = GBM 6.990)
K01vinv06_u:2083: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2084: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2087: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
K01vinv06_u:2089: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe brāhmaṇo lāṅgalaṃ vāhayati /
K01vinv06_u:2090: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā puruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ (MSV I
K01vinv06_u:2091: sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṃgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
K01vinv06_u:2093: yadi bhagavantaṃ gautamam upetyābhivādayiṣyāmi karmaparihānir me bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:2095: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yena me na karmaparihāniḥ syān nāpi puṇyaparihānir iti /
K01vinv06_u:2098: evaṃ na karmaparihānir bhaviṣyati nāpi puṇyaparihānir iti /
K01vinv06_u:2103: anenopakramyāsmin pradeśe abhivādane kṛte sati pratyātmaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
K01vinv06_u:2106: evam anena dvābhyāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet* /
K01vinv06_u:2108: asminn ānanda pradeśe kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāvikopito 'sthisaṃghātas tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:2109: athāyuṣmān ānando laghu laghv eva caturguṇam uttarāsaṃgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2111: evam ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati yac ca kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena yac caitarhi bhagavateti /
K01vinv06_u:2114: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātam avikopitaṃ draṣṭum* /
K01vinv06_u:2115: etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātam upadarśayet* /
K01vinv06_u:2118: paśyanti bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātam avikopitaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ {Tib. adds dharmatā khalu etc., cf. Divy 63.11.} /
K01vinv06_u:2119: tatas tena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāvikopitaḥ śarīrasaṃghāta ucchrāpitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2124: bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāyāvikopitaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya (fol. 161v1 = GBM 6.991)
K01vinv06_u:2126: śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdham antaḥpurakumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgreṇa naigamajānapadaiś ca saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2127: evaṃ virūḍhako 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ uṣidattaḥ purāṇasthapatir viśākhā mṛgāramātā
K01vinv06_u:2128: anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni saṃprasthitāni kaiścit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni /
K01vinv06_u:2130: taiḥ śrutam antarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta iti /
K01vinv06_u:2131: śrutvā ca punas teṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyam utpannaṃ vṛthāsmākam āgamanam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2134: asmān me padāvihārāt kiyat puṇyaṃ (MSV I 76)
K01vinv06_u:2136: atha bhagavāṃs tasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2137: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2138: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2139: anyatamenāpy upāsakena tasmin pradeśe mṛttikāpiṇḍo dattaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2141: padāvihārasya tāvad iyat puṇyam ākhyātaṃ bhagavatā /
K01vinv06_u:2142: asya tu mṛttikāpiṇḍasya kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:2143: atha bhagavāṃs tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2144: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2145: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ āropayen mṛttikāpiṇḍam ekam* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2149: padāvihārasya ca mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ca iyat puṇyam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
K01vinv06_u:2150: asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:2151: atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2152: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇapeṭā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2153: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitta āropayen muktapuṣpasya rāśim* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2159: atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2160: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2161: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2166: atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2167: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2168: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2173: atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2174: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇarāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2175: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2178: padāvihārasya mṛtpiṇḍadānasya muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālāvihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ceyat puṇyam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
K01vinv06_u:2180: atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2182: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇaparvatā meroḥ samā nāsya samā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:2184: eṣā hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate /
K01vinv06_u:2186: teṣām etad abhavat* parinirvṛtasya tāvad bhagavataḥ kāraṇam iyat puṇyam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
K01vinv06_u:2188: atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2189: tiṣṭhantaṃ pūjayed yaś ca yaś cāpi parinirvṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:2191: evaṃ hy acintiyā buddhā buddhadharmo 'py acintiyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2195: tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2196: kaiścic chrāvakabodhau cittāny utpāditāni kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K01vinv06_u:2197: kaiścid uṣmagatāni pratilabdhāni kaiścin mūrdhānaḥ kaiścit satyānuloma kaiścit kṣāntayaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2198: kaiścit srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kaiścid anāgāmiphalam* /
K01vinv06_u:2200: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā (MSV I 79) /
K01vinv06_u:2201: tatra śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhis tasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2203: atha bhagavān kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2205: aśrauṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ bhagavān kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane asmākam evārāme iti /
K01vinv06_u:2206: śrutvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2207: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2208: ekāntaniṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati (fol. 162v1 = GBM 6.993)
K01vinv06_u:2210: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir utthāyāsanāt pūrvavad yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2211: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti /
K01vinv06_u:2212: pūrvavat śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati
K01vinv06_u:2213: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti /
K01vinv06_u:2215: na tāvad bhoḥ puruṣānyatīrthyakānāṃ praveśo deyo yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena na bhuktam* /
K01vinv06_u:2217: evam ārya iti dauvārikaḥ puruṣa anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
K01vinv06_u:2218: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto (MSV I 80)
K01vinv06_u:2219: bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ pūrvavad yāvad dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv06_u:2220: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapo 'nyatamasmād āraṇyakāc chayanāsanād dīrghakeśaśmaśrulūhacīvaro jetavanaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2227: tatraiva piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca paryupāsiṣye iti /
K01vinv06_u:2233: mā tāvat tīrthyānāṃ praveśaṃ dāsyasi yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktam* /
K01vinv06_u:2235: āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhā ye māṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya iti na jānate /
K01vinv06_u:2236: gacchāmi kṛpaṇajanasyānukampāṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2239: yāvad anyatarā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhibhūtā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣām aṭati /
K01vinv06_u:2242: tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca śānteneryāpathena /
K01vinv06_u:2244: nūnaṃ mayaivaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā yena me iyaṃ samavasthā /
K01vinv06_u:2245: yady āryo mahākāśyapo mamāntikād anukampām (MSV I 81)
K01vinv06_u:2246: upādāyācāmaṃ pratigṛhṇīyād aham asmai dadyām iti /
K01vinv06_u:2247: tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāś cetasā cittam ājñāya pātram upanāmitam* /
K01vinv06_u:2248: yadi te bhagini parityaktaṃ tad dīyatām asmin pātre iti /
K01vinv06_u:2249: tatas tayā cittam abhiprasādya tasmin pātre dattaṃ makṣikā ca patitā /
K01vinv06_u:2253: kiṃ cāpy āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣaṇayā (fol. 163r1 = GBM 6.994)
K01vinv06_u:2256: āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāś cetasā cittam ājñāya tasyā eva samakṣam anyatamaṃ kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya paribhuktam* /
K01vinv06_u:2258: kiṃ cāpy āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣaṇayā paribhuktaṃ nānenāhāreṇāhārakṛtyaṃ kariṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:2259: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapas tasyāś cetasā cittam ājñāya tāṃ nagarāvalambikām idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2260: bhagini prāmodyam utpādayāmy ahaṃ tvadīyenāhāreṇa rātriṃdivasam atināmayiṣyāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:2262: mamāryeṇa mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratipāditaḥ pragṛhīta iti āyuṣmati mahākāśyape cittam abhiprasādya kālagatā /
K01vinv06_u:2264: sā śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī kālaṃ ca kurvāṇā no tu dṛṣṭā kutropapannā iti /
K01vinv06_u:2265: sa nagarān vyavalokayitum ārabdho na paśyati tiraścaḥ pretān manuṣyāṃś ca cāturmahārājikān devān trayastriṃśān na paśyati /
K01vinv06_u:2266: tathā hy adhastād devānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nopariṣṭāt* /
K01vinv06_u:2267: atha śakro devānām indro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2276: ime tāvan manuṣyāḥ puṇyānām apratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśyeva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2277: tasmād dānāni vā dadāmi puṇyāni vā karomi /
K01vinv06_u:2279: yanv aham enaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayeyam iti viditvā kṛpaṇavīthyāṃ gṛhaṃ nirmitavān* /
K01vinv06_u:2280: cīracīracīvarakaṃ kākābhinilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānam abhinirmāya uddhūtaśiraskaḥ śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitaḥ sphuṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ vayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2281: śacy api devakanyā kuvindabhāvaveṣadhāriṇī tasarikāṃ kartum ārabdhā /
K01vinv06_u:2282: pārśve cāsya divyā sudhā sajjīkṛtā tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:2283: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ kṛpaṇānāthavanīpakajanānukaṃpako 'nupūrveṇa tad gṛham anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2284: duḥkhitako 'yam iti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāritam* /
K01vinv06_u:2288: divyaṃ cāsya sudhābhaktam ayaṃ ca gṛhavistaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2289: suviruddham iti jñātvā jāto me hradi saṃśayaḥ // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2292: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛtto yāvat paśyati śakraṃ devendram* /
K01vinv06_u:2295: yasya bhagavatā dīrgharātrānugato vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaḥ samūla āvṛḍho yathāpi tat tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena /
K01vinv06_u:2297: ime tāvan manuṣyā apratyakṣadarśinaḥ puṇyānāṃ dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti /
K01vinv06_u:2298: ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśyeva puṇyāni kathaṃ dānāni na dadāmi puṇyāni vā na karomi /
K01vinv06_u:2301: kṛtapuṇyā hi modante asmiṃl loke paratra ca // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2302: tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ praveṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2303: atha śakro devendro ākāśastha evāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātraṃ pūrayati /
K01vinv06_u:2304: āyuṣmān api mahākāśyapaḥ pātram avāṅmukhaṃ karoty annaṃ pānaṃ (MSV I 84) choryate /
K01vinv06_u:2309: amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapaḥ ācāmena pratipāditaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2312: śrutvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2313: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2314: sa ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati /
K01vinv06_u:2316: atha rājā prasenajit kosalaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2317: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān āryamahākāśyapam uddiśya bhaktaṃ saptāheneti /
K01vinv06_u:2318: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena /
K01vinv06_u:2319: atha rājā prasenajit kosalo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2320: atha rājā prasenajit kosalas tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati /
K01vinv06_u:2322: anyatamaś ca koṭṭamallako vṛddhānte cittam abhiprasādayaṃs tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:2323: ayaṃ rājā pratyakṣadarśyeva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratitiṣṭho 'tṛpta eva puṇyair dānāni dadānti puṇyāni karoti /
K01vinv06_u:2325: atha rājā prasenajit kosalo 'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ śucinā praṇītena
K01vinv06_u:2326: khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā
K01vinv06_u:2327: dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv06_u:2329: rājan kasya nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādiśāmi (fol. 164r1 = GBM 6.996) /
K01vinv06_u:2330: kiṃ tavāhosvid yena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2333: ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:2334: bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya bhagavān nāmnā dakṣiṇāṃ ādiśatv iti /
K01vinv06_u:2335: tato bhagavatā koṭṭamallakasya nāmnā dakśiṇā ādiṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:2337: ṣaṣṭhe divase rājā kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2342: kimarthaṃ deva kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyvasthita iti /
K01vinv06_u:2345: yatredānīṃ bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃkte koṭṭamallasya nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādiśatīti /
K01vinv06_u:2348: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādiśatīti /
K01vinv06_u:2350: śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇītatara āhāraḥ kartavyaḥ prabhūtaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2352: upārdho bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre pataty ardho bhūmāv iti /
K01vinv06_u:2353: amātyair aparasmin divase prabhūtaḥ āhāraḥ sajjitaḥ praṇītaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2354: tataḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariveṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2355: (MSV I 86) upārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre pātayanty upārdhaṃ bhūmau /
K01vinv06_u:2356: tataḥ koṭṭamallakāḥ pradhāvitā bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti /
K01vinv06_u:2359: yady asya rājñaḥ prabhūtaṃ saṃpatsvāpateyam asti /
K01vinv06_u:2360: santy anye 'py asmadvidhā duḥkhitakā ye ākāṃkṣante /
K01vinv06_u:2364: na śaktaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayituṃ yathā pūrvam* /
K01vinv06_u:2365: tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama bhagavān nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādisatīti viditvā dakṣiṇām aśrutvaiva pradiṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2366: tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasya nāmnā evaṃ dakṣiṇādiṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:2368: balaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāsapiṇḍikāyāḥ // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2370: bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:2373: icchasi tvam ānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitkosalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāsapiṇḍikām ārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum* /
K01vinv06_u:2374: etasya bhagavan kālaḥ etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāsapiṇḍikām ārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet*
K01vinv06_u:2381: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K01vinv06_u:2382: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2383: pūrvavad yāvad unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2402: gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:2403: sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etam arthaṃ nivedayati /
K01vinv06_u:2413: putrasya vistareṇa yad gṛhapatnyābhihitaṃ tat sarvam ākhyāya kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:2414: iyaṃ mayā ātmīyā alavaṇikā kulmāsapiṇḍikā ānītā /
K01vinv06_u:2419: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukaṃpakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
K01vinv06_u:2420: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddhas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2424: nūnaṃ mayaivaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā /
K01vinv06_u:2426: yady ayaṃ mamāntikād alavaṇikāṃ kulmāsapiṇḍikāṃ gṛhṇīyād aham asmai dadyām iti /
K01vinv06_u:2427: tataḥ pratyekabuddhas tasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittam ājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān* /
K01vinv06_u:2428: sacet tava parityaktaṃ dīyatām asmin pātre iti /
K01vinv06_u:2429: tatas tīvreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇikā kulmāsapiṇḍikā pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā /
K01vinv06_u:2430: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau daridrapuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kosalas tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:2432: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu rājaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ (fol. 165r1 = GBM 6.998) kāritavān* /
K01vinv06_u:2433: ṣaṭkṛtvo 'syām eva śrāvastyāṃ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktas tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇa /
K01vinv06_u:2434: etarhy api rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2438: balaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāsapiṇḍikāyāḥ // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2440: bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasyālavaṇikā kulmāsapiṇḍikām ārabhya karmaplotir vyākṛteti (MSV I 89)
K01vinv06_u:2443: upsaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2444: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv06_u:2445: atha rājā prasenajit kosala utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2446: adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv06_u:2448: tato rājñā prasenajitā kosalena buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsīṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam* /
K01vinv06_u:2450: tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālām abhyudyato dātum* /
K01vinv06_u:2451: tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahākolāhalo jātaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2453: tayā khaṇḍamallakena bhikṣām aṭantyā sa uccaśabdo mahāśabdaḥ śrutaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2455: bhavantaḥ kim eṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti /
K01vinv06_u:2457: rājñā prasenajitā kosalena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghas traimāsīṃ bhojitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2459: tailakumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālām abhyudyato dātum iti /
K01vinv06_u:2461: ayaṃ rājā prasenajit kosalaḥ puṇyair atṛptaḥ adyatvena dānāni dadāti puṇyāni (MSV I 90) karoti /
K01vinv06_u:2462: yanv aham api kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyām iti tayā khaṇḍamallakena tailasya stokaṃ yācitvā pradīpaḥ prajvālya bhagavataś caṃkrame dattaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2464: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavān śākyamunir varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śāstā loke utpannaḥ evam aham api varṣaśatāyuṣi śākyamunir eva śāstā bhaveyam* /
K01vinv06_u:2465: yathā cāsya śāriputramaudgalyāyanāv agrayugaṃ bhadrayugam ānando bhikṣur upasthāyikaḥ
K01vinv06_u:2466: śuddhodanaḥ pitā mahāmāyā mātā kapilavastu nagaraṃ rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ evaṃ mamāpi
K01vinv06_u:2467: śāriputramaudgalyāyanāv agrayugaṃ bhadrayugaṃ syād ānando bhikṣur upasthāyikaḥ (fol. 165v1 = GBM 6.999)
K01vinv06_u:2468: śuddhodanaḥ pitā mātā mahāmāyā kapilavastu nagaraṃ rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2469: yathā cāyaṃ bhagavān dhātuvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati evam aham api dhātuvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāpayeyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2470: yāvat sarve te dīpāḥ parinirvāṇāḥ sa tayā prajvālito dīpo jvalaty eva /
K01vinv06_u:2471: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ na tāvad upasthāpakaḥ pratisaṃlīyati yāvan na buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisaṃlīnā iti /
K01vinv06_u:2473: asthānam anavakāśo yad buddhā bhagavantaḥ ālokaśayyāṃ kalpayiṣyanti yanv ahaṃ pradīpaṃ nirvāpayeyam ti /
K01vinv06_u:2474: sa hastena nirvāpayitum ārabdho na śaknoti tataś cīvarakarṇikena tato vyajanena tathāpi na śaknotīti /
K01vinv06_u:2477: yadi vairaṃbhā api vāyavo vāyeyus te 'pi na śaknuyur nirvāpayituṃ prāg eva hastacīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā /
K01vinv06_u:2478: tathā (MSV I 91) hy ayaṃ pradīpas tayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa prajvālitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2479: api tv ānanda bhaviṣyaty asau dārikā varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhatsamyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2480: śāriputramaudgalyāyanau tasyāgrayugaṃ bhadrayugam ānando bhikṣur upasthāyikaḥ śuddhodanaḥ pitā mātā mahāmāyā kapilavastu nagaraṃ rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2483: amukayā nagarāvalambikayā bhagavataś caṃkrame śirasā pradīpo dattaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2485: iti śrutvā śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhir asāv anāgataguṇāpekṣayā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritā /
K01vinv06_u:2487: tato vismayajātas tailakumbhasahasram ādāya citrāṃ pradīpamālāṃ kṛtavān* /
K01vinv06_u:2489: tato bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2490: mayā ca bhadanta bhagavān āryamahākāśyapasya pūjādhikāreṇa bhaktasaptāhenopanimaṃtritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2491: tasya mama bhagavatā alavaṇikāṃ kulmāsapiṇḍikām ārabhya pūrvikā karmaplotir vyākṛtā /
K01vinv06_u:2492: punaś ca mayā bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2493: ekaikaś ca bhikṣuḥ śatasahasreṇa mūlyena vastrayugenācchāditas tailakumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya pradīpamālā dattā /
K01vinv06_u:2495: sādhu bhagavān mamāpy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākuryāt* /
K01vinv06_u:2496: kadāsvid ahaṃ lokajyeṣṭhaḥ syāṃ vināyaka iti /
K01vinv06_u:2499: gambhīrāvabhāsā durdṛśā duravabodhā atarkyā atarkyāvacarā sūkṣmā nipuṇā paṇḍitavijñavedanīyā /
K01vinv06_u:2500: sā na sukarā tvayaikena dānena samupadānetuṃ (fol. 166r1 = GBM 6.1000)
K01vinv06_u:2501: na dānaśatena na dānasahasreṇa na dānaśatasahasreṇāpi tu mahārāja tvayā anuttarāṃ
K01vinv06_u:2502: samyaksaṃbodhim abhiprārthayitā dātavyāny eva dānāni kartavyāny eva puṇyāni sevitavyāni
K01vinv06_u:2504: evaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi kadācil lokajyeṣṭho vināyaka iti /
K01vinv06_u:2505: evam ukto rājā prasenajit kosalaḥ prārodīd aśrūṇi varṣayan* /
K01vinv06_u:2506: atha rājā prasenajit kośalaś cīvarakarṇakenāśrūṇy unmṛjya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:2507: anuttarāṃ bhadanta bhagavatā samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārhayitā kiyanti dānāni dattāni puṇyāni vā kṛtānīti /
K01vinv06_u:2510: yan mayāsminn eva bhadrake kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni cānekaprakārāṇi kṛtāni tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye /
K01vinv06_u:2511: bhūtapurvaṃ mahārājāmitāyuṣi prajāyām upoṣadho nāma rāja babhūva /
K01vinv06_u:2513: mṛduḥ sumṛdus tadyathā tūlapicur vā karpāsapicur (MSV I 93)
K01vinv06_u:2516: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ
K01vinv06_u:2517: uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabhrus tuṅganāso dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2519: upoṣadhasya rājño 'śītiḥ strīsahasrāṇi kumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā prasrutāni /
K01vinv06_u:2520: ekaikā strī kathayati māndhāya māndhāya iti /
K01vinv06_u:2523: mūrdhnā jātas tasmād bhavatu kumārasya mūrdhāta iti nāma /
K01vinv06_u:2524: tatra kecin māndhāteti jānate kecin mūrdhāta iti /
K01vinv06_u:2526: māndhātuḥ kumārasya kumārakrīḍāyāṃ krīḍataḥ ṣaṭ śakrāś cyutāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2527: evaṃ yauvarājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaḍ mahārājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaḍ jāmbūdvīpakān janapadān samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ* /
K01vinv06_u:2530: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ durmukho nāma ṛṣiḥ paṃcābhijñaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2537: śrutvā niṣkāruṇiko 'yam ṛṣir iti kṛtvā uktaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2540: ayaṃ rājā caturdvīpeśvaraḥ kva mayā gantavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2542: evam avaragodānīyaṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ śakrāś cyutāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2546: evaṃ vinatake 'śvakarṇe sudarśane khadirake īṣādhāre yugandhare ca /
K01vinv06_u:2551: tataḥ sumerumūrdhany abhirohatā tena ṛśīṇā bhaṭabalāgraṃ stambhitam* /
K01vinv06_u:2552: divaukaso yakṣaḥ purojavo dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2553: niyaccha brāhmaṇa krodhaṃ naitat sarvatra sidhyati /
K01vinv06_u:2554: māndhātā nṛpatir hy evaṃ naite vaiśālakā vakāḥ // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2570: taiḥ punar api vīryam āsthāya paṃcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2571: tathā nandopanando nāgarājo māndhātṛbalaṃ dṛṣṭvā asurā hy ete iti caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2573: deva karoṭapāṇayo yakṣā māyādharāḥ sadāmattāś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2574: sarve ca nandopanandādayo bhagnā yena cāturmahārājikā devās tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2576: yat khalu mārṣā jānīdhvaṃ mahāsainyaṃ pratyupasthitam* /
K01vinv06_u:2581: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ māndhātā rājā cakravartī śakraṃ devendraṃ darśanāya gacchati /
K01vinv06_u:2583: kā śaktir asmākam anena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayitum* /
K01vinv06_u:2584: kin tu ardhaṃ pādyaṃ ca gṛhītvā pratyudgantavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2585: tataś cāturmahārājikā devā ardhaṃ pādyaṃ ca gṛhītvā cchatradhvajapatākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2586: tato rājā māndhātā cāturmahārājikān devān pratisaṃmodya devaiḥ parivṛto devāṃs trayastriṃśān gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2588: tato 'surāś caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ sannahya śakraṃ devendram abhigatāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2590: yat khalu kauśika jānīyā asurāḥ paṃca gulmakān bhaṅktvā pratyupasthitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2591: yat te kṛtyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kuruṣveti /
K01vinv06_u:2597: tato rājā māndhātā aṣṭādaśabhir bhaṭabalāgrakoṭībhir upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya guṇāsphālanaṃ kṛtavān* /
K01vinv06_u:2598: asurā aṣṭādaśa bhaṭabalāgrakoṭībhir dṛṣṭvā ativibhīṣaṇaṃ ca śabdaṃ śrutvā karṇau pidhāya niṣpalāyitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2600: asti me jambudvīpe dvīpaḥ ṛddhaś ca sphītaś ca kṣemaś ca subhikṣaś cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaś ca pūrvavidehaḥ avaragodānīyaḥ uttarakuruś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2601: yanv ahaṃ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:2602: sahacittopādād rājā māndhātā tasya ṛddhe parihīne jambudvīpam (fol. 167r1 = GBM 6.1002)
K01vinv06_u:2603: āgatya kharam ābādhitaṃ praveditavān gāthāṃ ca bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2609: nālam ekasya tad vittam iti vidvān samācaret* //
K01vinv06_u:2610: yaḥ prekṣate duḥkham ito nidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ rameta /
K01vinv06_u:2611: loke hi śalyam upadhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣate //
K01vinv06_u:2612: tataḥ sa rājā māndhātā nirargalaṃ yajñam iṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2616: tasmād dhi puṇyakāmena deyaṃ dānaṃ yathāvidhi /
K01vinv06_u:2617: kṛtapuṇyā hi modante loke 'smiṃś ca paratra ca // iti /
K01vinv06_u:2619: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau rājā māndhātā aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:2620: yan mayā itthaṃ satvahitaṃ kṛtaṃ tena nānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam* /
K01vinv06_u:2621: kiṃ tv etad dānam anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher hetumātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam* /
K01vinv06_u:2622: punar api mahārāja yan mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā sarvahitaṃ kṛtaṃ tac chrūyatām* /
K01vinv06_u:2623: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja mahāsudarśano nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataś catasṛbhiś ca mānuṣikābhi riddhibhiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2625: atha mahāsudarśano rājā dharmaprāsāde pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni bhojayitvā pratyekaṃ ca dūṣyayugenācchādayitvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2626: labdhvā hi vipulaṃ bhogaṃ na pramādyed vicakṣaṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2628: evaṃ datveha medhāvī śrāddho muktena cetasā /
K01vinv06_u:2631: syāt khalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsudarśano nāma rājā
K01vinv06_u:2632: cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataś catasṛbhiś ca mānuṣikābhi
K01vinv06_u:2633: riddhibhir iti na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:2634: api tv aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsudarśano nāma rājā cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataś catasṛbhiś ca mānuṣikābhi riddhibhiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2635: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir adhigatā iti na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:2636: api tu tad dānam anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam* /
K01vinv06_u:2637: punar api mahārāja yan mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayatā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni ca kṛtāni tac chrūyatām* /
K01vinv06_u:2639: sa idam evaṃrūpaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dānam adāc (fol. 167v1 = GBM 6.1003)
K01vinv06_u:2642: sa evaṃ dānāni datvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2643: dānaṃ datvā sukhī hi syād dānaṃ datvā viśāradaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2644: dānena pūjyate sādhu deveṣu manujeṣu ca //
K01vinv06_u:2646: mokṣam ākāṃkṣatā nityam aiśvaryaṃ ca surālayam* //
K01vinv06_u:2648: syāt khalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena velāmo nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo 'bhūt* /
K01vinv06_u:2650: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena velāmo nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo 'bhūvam* /
K01vinv06_u:2651: mayā tad evaṃvidhaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dānaṃ dattam* /
K01vinv06_u:2652: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir adhigateti na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:2653: api tu tad dānam anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam* /
K01vinv06_u:2654: punar api mahārāja yan mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayatā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni ca kṛtāni tac chrūyatām* /
K01vinv06_u:2655: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja śakuno nāma rājābhūc cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataś catasṛbhiś ca mānuṣikābhi riddhibhiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2657: tasya rājñī na putro na duhitā /
K01vinv06_u:2658: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2659: īdṛśe mama bhogaiśvarye na putro na duhitā /
K01vinv06_u:2663: mārṣa kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:2665: kauśika īdṛśe mama mahābhogaiśvarye na putro na duhitā /
K01vinv06_u:2670: tatas te putrā bhaviṣyanti duhitaraś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2671: śakreṇa gandhamādanāt parvatād oṣadhir ādāya tasya rājñaḥ preṣitā /
K01vinv06_u:2684: api tu katareṇa bhājanena oṣadhyaḥ pītāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2690: tā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2692: tasyā apy agramahiṣyāḥ putro jāto 'ṣṭādaśabhir avalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2694: (fol. 168r1 = GBM 6.1004) tasya vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kuśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K01vinv06_u:2695: sa rājā taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikopaṃ janayate tān anyāṃś ca putrān dṛṣṭvā prasādaṃ pravedayate /
K01vinv06_u:2697: bhavanto vayam anena mahāśakunirājñā sarve abhibhūtā gacchāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2701: rājā mahāśakunir na śaknoti taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayitum* /
K01vinv06_u:2705: eṣa tava pitā koṭṭarājabhiḥ sārdhaṃ na śaknoti saṃgrāmayitum* /
K01vinv06_u:2707: amba aham ebhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayāmi /
K01vinv06_u:2709: putra tvam asyāniṣṭo (MSV I 101) dveṣyaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2710: sa eṣa tava kiṃ rathaṃ dāsyati /
K01vinv06_u:2720: sa dvau tūṇau baddhvā ratham adhiruhya nirgantum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2723: ko 'yaṃ kuśaḥ kumāro bhadrakalpīyo bodhisatvaḥ khedam āpatsyate /
K01vinv06_u:2732: yadi cakraṃ gadāṃ kṣipanti tad rasātalaṃ praviśati /
K01vinv06_u:2736: sa sarvasāmantavijayaṃ kṛtvā pituḥ sakāśam āgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2750: yāvan mahāśakunirājñānyasya putrasyārthe vyājāntareṇa (MSV I 102) sā
K01vinv06_u:2752: nakṣatradivasamuhūrtadivasaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kuśaḥ kumāro niveśitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2754: bhavanto na kenacit kuśasyādarśaḥ samarpayitavyo nāpy abhiṣekapātreṇa snāpayitavyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2759: ka eṣa piśācaḥ kumārāṇāṃ madhye (fol. 168v1 = GBM 6.1005) krīḍati /
K01vinv06_u:2761: bhūyo 'pi tayā kumāraiḥ sārdhaṃ jalakrīḍanayā krīḍan dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2766: tayā pradīpaṃ prajvālya kuṇḍīrakeṇa pracchādya sthāpitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2769: yāvat paśyati aṣṭādaśabhir avalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato siṃhavaktrākṛtimukhaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2770: sā kathayati piśācaḥ piśāca iti kṛtvā niṣpalāyitā /
K01vinv06_u:2776: kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣā na santi yāhaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ piśācasyānupradattā /
K01vinv06_u:2790: yāvad anyatamasmin karvaṭake siṃhabhayena mahājanakāyā dvārāṇi baddhvā diśo 'nuvyavalokayantas tiṣṭhanti /
K01vinv06_u:2798: kuśena kumāreṇa siṃhasamīpaṃ gatvā śaṃkhaḥ āpūritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2807: tasya yasmin karvaṭake sā patnī taṃ ca karvaṭakaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2814: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu /
K01vinv06_u:2816: sa mālikas tasyā dārikāyās tāṃ mālām
K01vinv06_u:2819: na tvaṃ kadācid īdṛśīṃ mālāṃ grathitapūrvaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2823: tena sa tatra nītas tayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2835: sa sūpakāras tasyā dārikāyās taṃ sādhanapacanaṃ samarpayati /
K01vinv06_u:2860: yadi kiṃcid vakṣyāmi na me svasthīkariṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:2863: tadā śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ piśācaḥ piśāca iti /
K01vinv06_u:2869: sā rājaduhitā yena labdhapūrvā tena śrutam* /
K01vinv06_u:2870: yā sā mama rājaduhitā labdhapūrvā sā kuśaṃ kumāraṃ parityajya svagṛhaṃ gatā /
K01vinv06_u:2872: yadi tāvan me dārikām anuprayacchasīti evaṃ kuśalam* /
K01vinv06_u:2875: eṣā mama duhitā rājño mahāśakuneḥ putrasya kuśasya kumārasya pradattikā /
K01vinv06_u:2877: sa caturaṃgeṇa balakāyenāgatya tasya rājadhānīṃ veṣṭayitvāvasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2878: sa rājā tena sārdhaṃ na śaknoti saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayitum* /
K01vinv06_u:2884: yadi mama rājā duhitaram anuprayacchati ahaṃ tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣye /
K01vinv06_u:2887: eṣā mayā (MSV I 105) duhitā mahāśakuneḥ putrasya dattikā /
K01vinv06_u:2891: deva eṣa tāvad anena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayatu /
K01vinv06_u:2894: kuśaḥ kumāraḥ paṃcaśatike dvau tūṇau baddhvā śaṃkhacakragadāṃ ca gṛhītvā nirgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2907: tena tasya caturaṃgo balakāyo 'nupradatto mahatā satkāreṇa sānupreṣitā /
K01vinv06_u:2913: yena caturaṃgo balakāya ūḍhas tatra nātidūre eḍhakāś caranti /
K01vinv06_u:2917: yadi tāvad anuprayacchatha ity evaṃ kuśalam* /
K01vinv06_u:2926: ata eva iyaṃ rājaduhitā mamāntike aprasādaṃ pravedayati /
K01vinv06_u:2931: ayaṃ bhadrakalpīyo bodhisatvo rūpaśobhāvirahād ātmānaṃ praghātayati /
K01vinv06_u:2934: kumāra mā khedam āpatsyase mā ātmānaṃ praghātaya /
K01vinv06_u:2935: imaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śirasi dhāraya pūrṇamanoratho bhaviṣyasi /
K01vinv06_u:2952: tena sā purī catūratnamayīṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpitā /
K01vinv06_u:2953: kuśena kumāreṇa vāsitam iti kuśāvatī kuśāvatīti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv06_u:2955: kuśo nāma balacakravartī teṣu ṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi (MSV I 107)
K01vinv06_u:2957: sa ātmano yajñasaṃpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:2958: samṛddhim ātmano dṛṣṭvā deveṣu manujeṣu ca /
K01vinv06_u:2959: ko dānaṃ na prayaccheta saṃpattir yena labhyate //
K01vinv06_u:2960: pratyūhya yo 'yaṃ śatāni puṃsāṃ mātsaryam ākramya sapatnabhūtam* /
K01vinv06_u:2961: dadāti dānaṃ paralokabhīruḥ śūreṣv asau śūrataro mato me //
K01vinv06_u:2962: na taṃ hi śūraṃ munayo vadanti yaḥ śastrapāṇir vicaraty anīke /
K01vinv06_u:2963: dānaṃ prayacchanti viśāradā ye śūrāṃs tu tān sarvavido vadanti //
K01vinv06_u:2964: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena kuśo nāma rājā babhūva balacakravartī yena tatṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni /
K01vinv06_u:2966: api tv aham eva tena kālena tena samayena kuśo nāma rājābhūvaṃ balacakravartī /
K01vinv06_u:2967: mayaiva tatṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni /
K01vinv06_u:2968: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā (fol. 170r1 = GBM 6.1008)
K01vinv06_u:2971: api tv abhūn me taddānam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ vā saṃbhāramātrakaṃ vā /
K01vinv06_u:2973: kiṃ bhadanta kuśena rājñā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākenāṣṭādaśabhir avalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ (MSV I 108)
K01vinv06_u:2976: kuśenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāni avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
K01vinv06_u:2977: kuśenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:2978: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
K01vinv06_u:2979: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
K01vinv06_u:2980: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv06_u:2981: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
K01vinv06_u:2984: asati buddhānāṃ bhagavatām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukaṃpakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
K01vinv06_u:2985: athānyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs tad udyānam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2990: tena gṛhapatinā svayam evotthāya gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ uktaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:2991: siṃhamukhāṣṭādaśabhir avalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kutra tvaṃ praviśasi /
K01vinv06_u:2993: mā haivāyaṃ tapyeta atyantakṣataś copahataś ceti viditvopari vihāyasam iti vistaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2994: yāvat tena satkṛto yāvat pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2995: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ nāham asya (MSV I 109)
K01vinv06_u:2997: yat tu kārāḥ kṛtā anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeya /
K01vinv06_u:2998: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatir eṣa evāsau kuśaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:2999: yad anena pratyekabuddhasyāntike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāṣṭādaśabhir avalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ siṃhavaktrākṛtimukhaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3000: yat tu kārāḥ kṛtās tasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā saṃvṛtto balacakravartī /
K01vinv06_u:3001: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3005: ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3006: punar api mahārāja yan mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayatā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni (fol. 170v1 = GBM 6.1009)
K01vinv06_u:3008: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja kaliṃgeṣu triśaṃkur nāma mataṃgarājo 'bhūt* /
K01vinv06_u:3010: tasya viṣaye yadā durbhikṣaṃ bhavati tadā satyopayācanena devo vaṛṣati /
K01vinv06_u:3014: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:3015: yāvad apareṇa samayena naimittikair dvādaśavārṣikī anāvṛṣṭir vyākṛtā /
K01vinv06_u:3016: tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ (MSV I 110) kāritam* /
K01vinv06_u:3019: yasya yuṣmākam iyantaṃ kālam annam asti sa tiṣṭhatu /

K01vinv06_u:3128: saced ādarśamukhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi jñātīnāṃ garhyo bhaviṣyāmi /
K01vinv06_u:3129: katham idānīm ayaṃ rājā jyeṣṭhaputrān apāsya kanīyāṃsaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayatīti /
K01vinv06_u:3132: haṃta grāmaṇyo mamātyayād yuṣmābhir ekaikaḥ kumāraḥ parīkṣitavyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3136: mukuṭaṃ ca mūrdhni upanibaddhaṃ niścalaṃ bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:3138: ṣaṭ prajñāprativedanīyāni jñātavyāni antar nidhir bahir nidhir antarbahir nidhiḥ vṛkṣāgre nidhiḥ parvatāgre nidhir udakānte nidhiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3139: yasya sarvāṇy etāni samābhavanti sa yuṣmābhir mamātyayād rājye pratiṣṭhāpayitavya ity uktvā sarvakṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayā iti yāvat kālagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3140: tair amātyair jyeṣṭhasya kumārasya maṇipādukāyugaṃ samarpitam* /
K01vinv06_u:3155: asyāpi ṣaṭ prajñāprativedanīyāni jñātavyāni antar nidhir bahir nidhir antarbahir nidhir vṛkṣāgre nidhiḥ parvatāgre nidhir udakānte nidhiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3165: tasya rājñaḥ saṃsthānavṛkṣas tasya madhyāhne yatra chāyā sphuritvā tiṣṭhati tatra nidhiḥ /

K01vinv06_u:3189: ayam ādarśamukho rājā prājñas tasya sakāśaṃ gacchāvaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3190: sa etam arthaṃ nitīrayitvā asmākaṃ yuktam ayuktaṃ vakṣyati /

K01vinv06_u:3196: tena pāṣāṇaṃ gṛhītvā śirasi prahāro dattaḥ /

K01vinv06_u:3218: tatra takṣāṇo mukhena vāsīm ādāya pārāt pāram āgacchati /

K01vinv06_u:3232: sa tayā dārako vastreṇa pracchādya śāyāpitako 'bhūt* /

K01vinv06_u:3285: pūrvavad yāvad asmākam api sandeśaṃ naya /

K01vinv06_u:3296: upasaṃkramya daṇḍī rājānaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3297: te 'py amī pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3302: daṇḍinā gṛhapatinā saha vivādas tat sarvam ārocitam* /
K01vinv06_u:3309: asya daṇḍino jihvāṃ chindata yena nārocitam* /
K01vinv06_u:3310: asyāpi netroddharaṇaṃ kuruta yena balīvardā nopanibaddhāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3312: ekadā me balīvardā hṛtā aparaṃ netroddharaṇaṃ kriyate /
K01vinv06_u:3315: deva anena daṇḍinā mama baḍavā praghātitā /
K01vinv06_u:3318: asya puruṣasya jihvāṃ chindata yenoktaṃ yathā śaknoṣi tathā vārayeti /
K01vinv06_u:3319: asyāpi daṇḍino hastau ardhāpayata yenānyena śakyaṃ tāṃ dhārayituṃ nānyatra śilāprahārayā /
K01vinv06_u:3321: ekadā me baḍavā praghātitā dvitīyaṃ ye jihvācchedaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3325: gaccha eṣa eva te bhartā bhavatu /
K01vinv06_u:3327: ekadā anena mama bhartā praghātito 'para eṣa me svāmī bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:3331: asya takṣāṇasya jihvāṃ chindata yo vāsīṃ muktvodakamadhye vācaṃ niścārayati /

K01vinv06_u:3388: sā tvam ekaṃ sthānaṃ parityajya ekaṃ sugṛhītaṃ kuru /
K01vinv06_u:3395: rājā āttamanasā caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpitā /

K01vinv06_u:3400: sa ātmano yajñasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /

K01vinv06_u:3408: yena taddvādaśavārṣike durbhikṣe vartamāne anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:3410: api tv aham eva tena kālena tena samayenādarśamukho nāma rājābhūvaṃ prābhāvyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3411: mayaiva dvādaśavārṣike durbhikṣe vartamāne anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:3412: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgena vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddheti /
K01vinv06_u:3414: api tu me tad dānaṃ hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ (fol. 174r1 = GBM 6.1016)
K01vinv06_u:3416: punar api mahārāja yan mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni tac chrūyatām* /
K01vinv06_u:3417: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja sudhano nāma rājābhuc cakravartī /
K01vinv06_u:3418: tena caturaśītiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni (MSV I 123)
K01vinv06_u:3419: varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni /
K01vinv06_u:3420: sa ātmano yajñasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:3421: samṛddhim ātmano dṛṣṭvā deveṣu manujeṣu ca /
K01vinv06_u:3422: na prayacched dhi ko dānaṃ saṃpattir yena labhyate //
K01vinv06_u:3423: pratyūhya yo 'yaṃ śatāni puṃsāṃ mātsaryam ākramya sapatnabhūtam* /
K01vinv06_u:3424: dadāti dānaṃ paralokabhīruḥ śūreṣv asau śūrataro mato me //
K01vinv06_u:3425: na taṃ hi śūraṃ munayo vadanti yaḥ śastrapāṇir vicaraty anīke /
K01vinv06_u:3426: dānaṃ prayacchanti viśāradā ye śūrāṃs tu tān sarvavido vadanti //
K01vinv06_u:3427: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūc cakravartī yena
K01vinv06_u:3428: tac caturaśītiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭaṃ māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni
K01vinv06_u:3429: bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni /
K01vinv06_u:3431: api tu tad dānaṃ saṃbodher hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam* /
K01vinv06_u:3432: punar api mahārāja yan mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni vīryapāramitā ca paripūritā na cānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir adhigateti tac chrūyatām* /
K01vinv06_u:3433: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja paṃcālaviṣaye dvau rājānau babhūvatuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3435: tatrottarapaṃcālo dhano nāmnā hastināpure nagare rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ (MSV I 124) ca /
K01vinv06_u:3438: tasmiṃś ca nagare mahān hrada utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃcchanno haṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhito ramaṇīyaḥ /

K01vinv06_u:3728: yanv aham etāṃ prābhṛtanyāyena svayam evopanayeyam* /
K01vinv06_u:3729: tatas taṃ pāśam ādāya yena sudhano rājakumāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3731: idaṃ mayā (MSV I 136) devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtam ānītaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti /
K01vinv06_u:3732: adrākṣīt sudhano rājakumārīṃ manoharāṃ kinnarīm abhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ prāsādikāṃ paramayā
K01vinv06_u:3733: varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāṃ sarvaguṇasamuditām aṣṭādaśabhiḥ strīlakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtāṃ
K01vinv06_u:3740: śacīm iva bhraṣṭakāṃcīṃ nūpurāvacchāditapādāṃ chātodarīṃ tāṃ prakīrṇahārām uttaptajāmbūnadacāruvarṇāṃ
K01vinv06_u:3741: dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta baddho dṛḍhaṃ (MSV I 137)
K01vinv06_u:3748: saṃyogābhilaṣitaparamarahasyaśabdena kāmaśareṇa hṛdaye viddhaḥ āha ca /
K01vinv06_u:3752: sadyaḥ sa cetasi tu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:3753: sa tām atimanoharāṃ manoharāṃ gṛhītvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3755: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā sārdham upari prāsādatalagataḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K01vinv06_u:3756: manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sudhanaḥ kumāro 'nekaiś copacāraśatais tathāpahṛto yathā sudhanaḥ kumāro muhūrtam api tāṃ na jahāti /
K01vinv06_u:3757: yāvad apareṇa samayena janapadād dvau brāhmaṇāv abhyāgatau /
K01vinv06_u:3758: tatraiko rājānaṃ saṃśrito dvitīyaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāram* /
K01vinv06_u:3759: yo rājānaṃ saṃśritaḥ sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiś ca saṃvibhaktaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3760: yas tu sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ sa bhogamātreṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3762: kumāra yadā tvaṃ pitur atyayād rājye pratiṣṭhāsyasi tadā me kiṃ kariṣyasīti /
K01vinv06_u:3764: yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye sthāpitaḥ evam ahaṃ tvām api paurohitye sthāpayāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:3765: eṣa ca vṛttāntas tena brāhmaṇena karṇaparaṃparayā śrutaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3767: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā kumāro rājyam eva nāsādayiṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:3769: yāvad apareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite anyatamaḥ kārvaṭiko viruddhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3770: tasya samucchittaye rājñā eko daṇḍaḥ preṣitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3777: deva kimarthaṃ svabalaṃ hāpyate parabalaṃ vardhyate /
K01vinv06_u:3778: yāvat kaścid devavijite śastrabalopajīvī sarvo 'sāv āhūyatām iti /
K01vinv06_u:3793: evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutyāntaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3796: (fol. 178v1 = GBM 6.1025) punar api taddarśanāt sarvaṃ vismṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:3799: deva sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum* /
K01vinv06_u:3801: nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yayā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na praviśatīti /
K01vinv06_u:3804: amātyaiḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho hastyaśvarathapadātisaṃpanno 'nekapraharaṇopakaraṇayuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3805: tataḥ kumāro nirgataḥ ukto gaccha kumāra sajjo balaugha iti /
K01vinv06_u:3810: tāta yady evaṃ mātāraṃ dṛṣṭvā gacchāmi /
K01vinv06_u:3812: sa manoharāsantakaṃ cūḍāmaṇim ādāya mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:3814: ayaṃ cūḍāmaṇiḥ suguptaḥ sthāpayitavyo na kathaṃcin manoharāyā
K01vinv06_u:3816: sa evaṃ mātaraṃ sandiśyābhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaudhatūryaninādaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3817: anupūrveṇa janapadān atikramya tasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre 'nyatamad vṛkṣamūkaṃ niśritya vāsam upagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3823: bahuśo 'ham anena pathā samatikrānto na ca me kadācid yānaṃ pratihatam* /
K01vinv06_u:3824: ko 'tra hetur yena yānaṃ pratihatam iti /
K01vinv06_u:3827: ayaṃ bhadrakalpiko bodhisatvaḥ khedam āpadyate yuddhāyābhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3830: na ca kasyacit prāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti viditvā pāṃcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatim āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:3831: ehi tvaṃ pāṃcika sudhanasya kumārasya karvaṭakam ayuddhena sannāmaya /
K01vinv06_u:3832: na ca te kasyacit prāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti /
K01vinv06_u:3833: tatheti pāṃcikena mahāyakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaś caturaṃgo balakāyo nirmitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3836: tato nānākhaḍgamusalatomaraprāsacakraśaktiśaraparaśvadhaḥ śastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayam upadarśayan mahatā balaughena pāṃcikaḥ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3838: yakṣāṇāṃ svaprabhāvāc ca prākāraḥ prapapāta vai //
K01vinv06_u:3840: balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tac ca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādam āpannāḥ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3850: vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3853: tataḥ ucchritadhvajapatākāḥ pūrṇakalaśair nānāvidhatūryaninādaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3854: tena ca samāśvāsitās tad abhiprāyāś ca rājabhaṭāḥ sthāpitā nipakāś ca gṛhītāḥ karapratyayāś ca nibaddhāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3855: tatas taṃ karvaṭakaṃ sphītīkṛtya sudhanaḥ kumāro nivṛttaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3856: dhanena ca rājñā tām eva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3857: gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇy ākṛṣya sarvaṃ tan nagaram antrair veṣṭitaṃ sapta ca ratnāni gṛhaṃ praveśyamānāni dṛṣṭāni /
K01vinv06_u:3858: tato rājā bhītas trastaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghu laghv evotthāya mahārhaśayane niṣadya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3859: mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya vā antarāya iti /
K01vinv06_u:3860: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ taṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa /
K01vinv06_u:3862: yādṛśo devena svapno dṛṣṭo niyataṃ kumāreṇa karvaṭako nirjitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3865: niyatam atonidānaṃ devasya rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3873: tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīm ekena sopānenāvataritavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:3877: tataś caturbhir brāhmaṇair vedavedāṅgapāragair devasya pādau jihvayā nirleḍhavyau /
K01vinv06_u:3879: evaṃ devo vidhūtapāpaś ciraṃ rājyaṃ pālayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:3884: deva yad eva sulabhaṃ tad eva durlabham* /
K01vinv06_u:3897: dṛḍhena hy ātmanā rājan kumārasyāsya dhīmataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3898: śakyasi hy aparāṃ kartuṃ dhātayaināṃ manoharām* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:3903: puṣkariṇī snātā sudhayā liptā saṃmṛṣṭā kṣudramṛgāṇāṃ ca rudhiram upāvartitam* /
K01vinv06_u:3906: vayaṃ rūpayauvanasaṃpannā idānīm asmākaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ paricārayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:3909: yāvad aparayā sa vṛttānto manoharāyai niveditaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3910: tato manoharā sañjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:3919: tatas tayā sa cūḍāmaṇir vastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni uktā ca /
K01vinv06_u:3920: putrike prāpte te kāle āgantavyam eva mamopālambho na bhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:3921: tato rājā yathānirdiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrṇottīrṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3924: tatsamanantaram eva manoharā gaganatalam utplutya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv06_u:3925: sparśasaṃgamane mahyaṃ hasitaṃ ramitaṃ ca me /
K01vinv06_u:3926: nāgīva bandhanān muktā eṣā gacchāmi sāṃpratam* // iti /
K01vinv06_u:3929: yad arthaṃ kṛto yatnaḥ sa na saṃpanno manoharā kinnarī palāyata (MSV I 144) iti /
K01vinv06_u:3931: deva siddho 'rthaḥ apagatapāpo devaḥ sāṃpratam iti /
K01vinv06_u:3933: tato manoharāyāḥ khagapathena gacchantyā etad abhavat* /
K01vinv06_u:3934: yad aham etām avasthāṃ prāptā tat tasya ṛṣer vyapadeśāt* /
K01vinv06_u:3935: yadi tena nākhyātam abhaviṣyan nāhaṃ grahaṇaṃ gatābhaviṣyam* /
K01vinv06_u:3936: tena hi yāsyāmi tāvat tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam iti /
K01vinv06_u:3939: maharṣe tvadvyapadeśād ahaṃ grahaṇaṃ gatā manuṣyasaṃsparśañ ca saṃprāptā /
K01vinv06_u:3943: yadi kadācit sudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchen māṃ samanveṣamāṇas tasyemām aṅgulimudrāṃ dātum arhasi /
K01vinv06_u:3947: yadi ca nivāryamāṇo no tiṣṭhet tasya mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum arhasi /
K01vinv06_u:3949: uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatās tān atikramya apare trayas tān atikramya apare trayas tān atikramya apare trayas tān atikramya himavān parvatarājaḥ
K01vinv06_u:3952: ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī utkīlakaḥ airāvatakaḥ adhunānaḥ pramokṣaṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3954: tatra khadirake parvate guhāpraveśaḥ ekadhārake ca (MSV I 145) utkīlake /
K01vinv06_u:3958: ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalo hantavyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3959: guhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahatā ajagaro vegena pradhāvati /
K01vinv06_u:3962: {MS: arāntaragatāṃ nābhī yatra paśyeta tatra kirīṭaḥ}
K01vinv06_u:3964: yatra paśyeta dvau meṣau saṃghaṭṭantu parasparam* /
K01vinv06_u:3965: tayoḥ śṛṅgam ekaṃ bhaṃktvā mārgaṃ pratilapsyase //
K01vinv06_u:3969: yadā paśyet tadā kīlaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet* //
K01vinv06_u:3970: śilāvartas tathā kūpo vilaṃghyas te ṣaṣṭihastakaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3973: kārmukaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā hantavyaś ca durāsadaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3975: naṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudanī hasanī āśīviṣā vetravatī ca /
K01vinv06_u:3979: āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ //
K01vinv06_u:3989: tato manoharā tam ṛṣim evam uktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:3990: yāvat sudhanaḥ kumāras taṃ karvaṭakaṃ sannāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuram anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:3992: tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4007: kumāra tiṣṭha prābhṛtaṃ sahitāv eva bhokṣyāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4016: sa cintāparaḥ praviṣṭo manoharāṃ na paśyati /
K01vinv06_u:4017: itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnyahṛdayaḥ śabdaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ manoharā manohareti /
K01vinv06_u:4026: sa pitur nairguṇyam upaśrutya kṛtaghnatāṃ ca mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4031: hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam* //
K01vinv06_u:4033: mano 'bhirāmā ca manoharā ca sā mano 'nukūlā ca manoratiś ca me /
K01vinv06_u:4034: santaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam // iti /
K01vinv06_u:4036: putra kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptā manoharā iti mayā pramuktā /
K01vinv06_u:4039: sa pitur nairguṇyam akṛtajñatāṃ coktā kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:4043: uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā // iti /
K01vinv06_u:4044: sa manoharāviyogaduḥkhārtaḥ kṛcchraṃ vilalāpa karuṇaṃ paridevamānaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4049: putra santy asminn antaḥpure tatprativiśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4052: amba kuto me ratiḥ prāpyatām iti /
K01vinv06_u:4053: sa tayā samāśvāsyamāno 'pi śokasantaptas tasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4055: yata eva labdhā tam eva tāvat pṛcchāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:4072: tāta na śakyaṃ mayā tām anānīyāntaḥpurasthena bhavitum* /
K01vinv06_u:4075: the remaining portion has been taken from Divy 453-461]
K01vinv06_u:4077: tato rājñā nagaraprākāraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv ārakṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpitā yathā kumāro na niṣkāsatīti /
K01vinv06_u:4080: paṃceme rātryām alpaṃ svapanti bahu jāgrati /
K01vinv06_u:4088: yadi dvāreṇa yāsyāmi rājā dvārapālakān rakṣakāṃś ca daṇḍenotsādayiṣyati yanv aham arakṣitena pathā gaccheyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:4089: sa rātryāṃ vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā yena rakṣiṇaḥ puruṣā na santi tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvāvatīrṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4091: tato 'sau candram avekṣya manoharāvirahita evaṃ vilalāpa /
K01vinv06_u:4092: bhoḥ pūrṇacandra rajanīkara tārarāja tvaṃ rohiṇīnayanakānta susārthavāha /
K01vinv06_u:4093: kaccit priyā mama manoharaṇaikadakṣā dṛṣṭā tvayā bhuvi manoharanāmadheyā // iti /
K01vinv06_u:4098: he tvaṃ kuraṅgi tṛṇavāripalāśabhakṣe svasty astu te cara sukhaṃ na mṛgārir asmi /
K01vinv06_u:4099: dīrghekṣaṇā mṛgavadhūkamanīyarūpā dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā //
K01vinv06_u:4100: sa tām atikramyānyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarair upabhujyamānasāram* /
K01vinv06_u:4104: tasmād api pradeśād atikrāntaḥ paśyaty āśīviṣam* /
K01vinv06_u:4107: rāgāgninā tava samo na viṣāgnir ugro drṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā //
K01vinv06_u:4108: tam api pradeśaṃ samatikrānto dadarśāparaṃ kokilābhināditam* /
K01vinv06_u:4109: drṣṭvā ca punas taṃ kokilam uvāca /
K01vinv06_u:4110: bhoḥ kokilottama vanāntaravṛkṣavāsin nārīmanohara patat trigaṇasya rājan /
K01vinv06_u:4113: tam api pradeśaṃ samatikrānto dadarśāśokavṛkṣaṃ sarvapariphullam* /
K01vinv06_u:4115: manoharāśokavimūrcchitaṃ mām* eṣo 'ñjalis te kuru vītaśokam* //
K01vinv06_u:4116: sa evaṃ viklavo 'nupūrveṇa tasya ṛṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4119: vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā //
K01vinv06_u:4120: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodyovāca /
K01vinv06_u:4123: tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho
K01vinv06_u:4124: paścāt svasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:4125: idaṃ hy avocad vacanaṃ ca subhrūḥ kumāra tṛṣṇā tvayi bādhate me /
K01vinv06_u:4127: mahac ca duḥkhaṃ vasatāṃ vaneṣu yātāṃ ca māṃ {Divy:
K01vinv06_u:4131: kumāra viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ khedam āpatsyase nivartasveti /
K01vinv06_u:4132: yadi ca nivāryamāṇo na tiṣṭhet tasya mārgam upadeṣṭum arhasi /
K01vinv06_u:4134: uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatās tān atikramyāpare trayas tān apy atikramya himavān parvatarājaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4137: sūdayā} nāmauṣadhis tayā ghṛtaṃ paktvā pātavyaṃ tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā smṛtibalaṃ ca vardhayati /
K01vinv06_u:4138: vānaraḥ samudānetavyo mantram adhyetavyaṃ saśaraṃ dhanur grahītavyaṃ maṇayo 'vabhāsātmakāḥ agado viṣaghātako 'yaskīlās trayo vīṇā ca /
K01vinv06_u:4141: kūlako} jalapathaḥ khadirakaḥ ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī utkīlaka airāvatako 'dhunānaḥ {Divy:
K01vinv06_u:4145: [Divy_456] tatra khadirake parvate guhāpraveśa ekadhārake ca utkīlake /
K01vinv06_u:4147: ebhir upāyais te sarve parvatāḥ samatikramaṇīyāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4149: ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalo hantavyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4156: yatra paśyeta dvau meṣau saṃghaṭṭantau parasparam* /
K01vinv06_u:4157: tayoḥ śṛṅgam ekaṃ bhaṃktvā mārgaṃ pratilapsyase //
K01vinv06_u:4161: yadā paśyet tadā kīlaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet* //
K01vinv06_u:4162: śilāvartas tathā kūpo vilaṃghyas te ṣaṣṭihastakaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4164: kārmukaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā hantavyaś ca durāsadaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4166: naṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudanī hasanī āśīviṣā vetravatī ca /
K01vinv06_u:4170: āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4176: āśīviṣāyāṃ sarpaviṣamantraprayogena samuttāro vetranadyāṃ [Divy_457] tīkṣṇaśastrasaṃpātayogena samuttāraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4180: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭān oṣadhamantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4181: tatas tena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpayitvā vānaram* /
K01vinv06_u:4182: tatas tān ādāya punar api tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4184: alaṃ kumāra kim anena vyavasāyena kiṃ manoharayā /
K01vinv06_u:4188: candrasya khe vicarataḥ kva sahāyabhāvaḥ daṃṣṭrābalena balinaś ca mṛgādhipasya /
K01vinv06_u:4189: agneś ca dāvadahena kva sahāyabhāvaḥ asmadvidhasya ca sahāyabalena kiṃ syāt* //
K01vinv06_u:4190: kiṃ bho mahārṇavajalaṃ na vigāhitavyaṃ kiṃ sarpaduṣṭa iti naiva cikitsanīyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4191: vīryaṃ bhajeta sumahadūrjitasatvadṛṣṭaṃ yatne kṛto yadi na sidhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ // iti /
K01vinv06_u:4192: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharopadiṣṭena vidhinā saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogena vinirjitya (MSV I 155)
K01vinv06_u:4200: kim anena bahunā pānīyena kriyata iti /
K01vinv06_u:4202: asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā nāma /
K01vinv06_u:4206: kim ete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante āhosvid ānupūrveṇeti /
K01vinv06_u:4210: śobhano 'yam [Divy_458] upāya imām aṃgulimudrām ekasmin ghaṭe prakṣipāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:4213: anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā tatprathamataraṃ snāpayitavyā /
K01vinv06_u:4216: tatas tayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūrdhni nipātito yāvad aṃgulimudrā utsaṅge nipatitā /
K01vinv06_u:4224: tato manoharā pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:4225: tāta yady asau sudhanaḥ kumāra āgacched yenāhaṃ hṛtā tasya tvaṃ kiṃ kuryāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4227: tam ahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu dikṣu kṣipeyaṃ manuṣyaḥ (MSV I 156)
K01vinv06_u:4234: yady asau kumāra āgacchet tasya hi tvāṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtacittopakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryāratnaṃ dadyām iti /
K01vinv06_u:4235: tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaḥ kumāro divyālaṅkāravibhūṣito drumasya kinnararājasyopadarśitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4236: tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśābhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam* /
K01vinv06_u:4237: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4238: tatas tasya vijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāstambhā ucchritāḥ sapta tālāḥ sapta bheryaḥ sapta śūkarāḥ / āha ca /
K01vinv06_u:4240: tvayā kāntyā jitās tāvad ete kinnaradārakāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4243: vyuptam anyūnam uccitya punar dehi tilāḍhakam* /
K01vinv06_u:4247: kuśalāś ca bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu devatāś caiṣām autsukyam āpatsyante avighnabhāvāya /
K01vinv06_u:4249: daivatyopasaṃhatena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantād āpūryamāṇo 'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4255: nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena paśyato drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ chettum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4256: tatas tān tilaśo 'vakīrya sapta tālān sapta bherīḥ sapta ca śūkarān bāṇena vidhya sumeruvad akampyo 'vasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4257: tato gaganatalasthābhir devatābhiś ca kinnaraśatasahasrair hāhākārakilikilāprakṣveḍoccair nādo mukto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4258: tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4260: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāras tāṃ pratyabhijñāya gāthābhigītenoktavān* /
K01vinv06_u:4261: yathā drumasya duhitā mameha tvaṃ manoharā /
K01vinv06_u:4262: śīghram etena satyena padaṃ vraja manohare //
K01vinv06_u:4265: devāyaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro balavīryaparākramasamanvito manoharāyāḥ pratirūpaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4268: tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ kinnaragaṇena saṃvarṇitaḥ sudhanaṃ kinnarābhimatena mahatā (MSV I 158)
K01vinv06_u:4269: satkāreṇa puraskṛtya manoharāṃ divyālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṃ vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ [Divy_460] sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitaḥ
K01vinv06_u:4270: kumāra eṣā te manoharā kinnarīparivṛtā bhāryārthāya dattā /
K01vinv06_u:4273: paraṃ tāteti sudhanaḥ kumāro drumasya kinnararājasya pratiśrutya kinnarabhavanastho manoharayā sārdhaṃ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa kṛīḍate ramate paricārayati
K01vinv06_u:4274: so 'pareṇa samayena svadeśam anusmṛtya mātāpitṛviyogajena duḥkhenātyāhato manoharāyā nivedayati /
K01vinv06_u:4276: tato manoharayā eṣa vṛttānto vistareṇa pitur niveditaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4278: gaccha kumāreṇa sārdham apakrāntayā te bhavitavyaṃ vipralambhakā manuṣyāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4279: tato drumeṇa kinnararājena prabhūtaṃ maṇimuktāsuvarṇādīn datvānupreṣitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4280: sa manoharayā sārdham uparivihāyasā kinnarakhagapathena saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa hastināpuranagaram anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4281: tato hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ nānāmanohareṇa surabhiṇā gandhaviśeṣeṇa sarvadig āmoditam* /
K01vinv06_u:4283: sarvaṃ ca tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ kāritaṃ candanavārisiktam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpasamucchritadhvajapatākaṃ
K01vinv06_u:4285: tataḥ kumāro 'nekanaravarasahasraparivṛto manoharayā sārdhaṃ hastināpuraṃ (MSV I 159)
K01vinv06_u:4287: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya vividhāni ratnāny ādāya pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4288: pitrā kaṇṭhe pariṣvaktaḥ pārśve rājāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4290: tato dhanena rājñātibalavīryaparākrama iti viditvā rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4292: yan mama manoharayā sārdhaṃ samāgamaḥ saṃvṛtto rājyābhiṣekaś cānuprāptas tat pūrvakṛtahetuviśeṣād yanv aham idānīṃ dānāni dadyāṃ puṇyāni kuryām iti /
K01vinv06_u:4293: tena hastināpure nagare dvādaśavarṣāṇi nirargalo yajña iṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4294: syāt kalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sudhanaḥ kumāro veti /
K01vinv06_u:4296: api tv aham eva tena [Divy_461] kālena tena samayena bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ vartamānaḥ sudhano nāma rājā babhūva /
K01vinv06_u:4297: yan mayā manoharānimittaṃ balavīryaparākramo darśito dvādaśavarṣāṇi nirargalo yajña
K01vinv06_u:4298: iṣṭo na tena mayānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir adhigatā kin tu tad dānaṃ tac ca vīryam
K01vinv06_u:4303: tāṃ protsāhayāmaḥ sā tair dūtair āhūyoktā /
K01vinv06_u:4304: yat khalu bhagini pūrvaṃ no lābhasatkāra evam evāsīt* idānīṃ lokāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya sakāśaṃ gacchanti /
K01vinv06_u:4306: asmākaṃ lābhasatkāraḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ samucchinnaḥ sā tvam adhyupekṣase /
K01vinv06_u:4308: āryakā mayā kiṃ karaṇīyam* bhagini tava jñātīnāṃ kṛte śramaṇena gautamena saha abrahmacaryaṃ caritavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:4310: etena naḥ pūrvavat* lābhasatkāro bhaved ity evam ukte caṃcā māṇavikā parivrājikā saṃbahulānām anyatīrthikaparivrājakānām evam āha /
K01vinv06_u:4311: āryakāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasyāpavādam ahaṃ na utsahe /
K01vinv06_u:4312: bhagini yāvat tvaṃ śramaṇasya gautamasyāpavādaṃ notsahase tāvad vayaṃ tvayā saha
K01vinv06_u:4313: nālapiṣyāmo na saṃlapiṣyāmo nālokayiṣyāmo na vyavalokayiṣyāmo na ca te sarvāvāseṣu
K01vinv06_u:4317: sā bhītā kathayaty eṣāham āryakā yan mayā karaṇīyam ehi tvaṃ bhagini jetavanam abhīkṣṇaṃ gaccha kaṃcit kālaṃ gatvā śramaṇasya gautamasya apavādaṃ dāpaya /
K01vinv06_u:4319: yāvat sā bhājanam ekaṃ baddhvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:4320: tena khalu samayena bhagavān anekaśatānāṃ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati /
K01vinv06_u:4323: adya mama karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni (MSV I 162)
K01vinv06_u:4324: labdhasaṃbhārāṇī pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:4325: tataś caṃcā māṇavikā parivrājikā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvāha /
K01vinv06_u:4327: ratir labdhā yaśo ghuṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ vadasi sāmpratam iti /
K01vinv06_u:4331: yaś cāpi kṛtvā na karomīti cāha //
K01vinv06_u:4335: atha śakro devendraḥ aho vateyaṃ caṃcā māṇavikā bhagavantaṃ viheṭhayiṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:4336: bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti viditvā tad bhājanam ṛddhyā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitavān* //
K01vinv06_u:4337: tataś caṃcā māṇavikā lajjitā dūram apasṛtā /
K01vinv06_u:4338: atha sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo bhagavantam evam āhuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4339: kṛtā [MSV,Wi_70] bhadanta rājñaḥ prasenajitasya dharmādhikārikī kathā vyākṛtaṃ taṃ
K01vinv06_u:4340: ca yatrānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tatprathamataraṃ cittam utpāditaṃ yāvat samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ lābhasatkārakathā /
K01vinv06_u:4341: vayam anavatapte mahāsarasi bhagavataḥ purastāt svakasvakānāṃ [fol._199v1] karmaṇāṃ (MSV I 163)
K01vinv06_u:4342: plotiṃ vyākuryāma ity adhivāsayati bhagavāṃ sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvena /
K01vinv06_u:4343: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ yaduta daśāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:4344: na tāvad buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvānti yāvad buddho na vyākṛto bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:4345: satvenāvaivartyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhavineyā vinītā bhavanti /
K01vinv06_u:4352: anavatapte mahāsarasi śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ pūrvikā karmaplotideśanā vyākṛtā bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:4353: atha buddho bhagavāṃ śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmo bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
K01vinv06_u:4354: āgamayata bhikṣavo yenānavataptaṃ mahāsaras tena svakasvakānāṃ pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākuryāma /
K01vinv06_u:4355: bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ bhadanta iti bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ atha bhagavān ekonaiḥ pañcabhir
K01vinv06_u:4356: arhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ anavatapte mahāsarasi caṇḍayakṣarākṣasaniṣevite
K01vinv06_u:4358: yaṃ vyāḍayakṣācaritaṃ manoramaṃ vicitrapuṣpais tarubhiḥ suśobhitam /
K01vinv06_u:4359: ito yato jalavahasāgaraṃgamā nadyaś catasraḥ prasṛtāś caturdiśaṃ //
K01vinv06_u:4361: gaṅgā ca sindhuś ca tathaiva vakṣuḥ sītā ca yan na prataranti mānuṣāḥ
K01vinv06_u:4362: nānyatra ye riddhibalasya lābhī hanteha gacchāmi saro mahodadhim* //
K01vinv06_u:4363: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittam utpādayanti tasmin samaye kuntapipīlakādayo 'pi prāṇino bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājānanti /
K01vinv06_u:4366: paśyato 'navatapte mahāsarasi karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmaḥ tatas tasyānavataptasya mahāsaraso
K01vinv06_u:4368: bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghena saha padmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ sthavirasthavirā api bhikṣavo
K01vinv06_u:4369: 'nyāsu padmakarṇikāsu niṣaṇṇāḥ tena khalu samayena śāriputro gṛdhrakūṭaparvate saṃghāṭikāṃ sīvyati sma /
K01vinv06_u:4371: gaccha maudgalyāyana pravrajyāsahāyakam ānayety evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmāṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ
K01vinv06_u:4372: anavatapte mahāsarasy antarhito gṛdhrakūṭe parvate āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya purataḥ sthitvā evam āha /
K01vinv06_u:4373: āyuṣman śāriputra pañcaśatārhadbhiḥ saha śāstā ekaikaśaḥ [fol._200r1] pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ
K01vinv06_u:4374: vyākartukāmas tvatpratīkṣaṇaparaḥ āgaccha gacchāmaḥ sa kathayaty āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana
K01vinv06_u:4379: atha (MSV I 165) mahāmaudgalyāyana ṛddhyā pañcabhir aṅgulībhiḥ sīvitum ārabdhaḥ āyuṣmāñ cchāriputraḥ kathayati āyuṣmaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyana syūtā bhavatu /
K01vinv06_u:4380: sa kathayaty āyuṣmañ cchāriputra sacet tvaṃ na gaccher balāt tvāṃ grahīṣyāmi /
K01vinv06_u:4381: athāyuṣmān śāriputras tasya kāñcīm ākṛṣya kathayati /
K01vinv06_u:4382: mahāmaudgalyāyana nanu tvaṃ bhagavatā ṛddhimatāṃ agro nirdiṣṭaḥ sa tvam etat tāvan naya paścān māṃ neṣyasīti /
K01vinv06_u:4383: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena te tatra nītāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4387: sa tena gṛdhrakūṭe parvate upanibaddha āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanenākṛṣṭo gṛdhrakūtaḥ parvataḥ kampitum ārabdhaḥ
K01vinv06_u:4389: anena gṛdhrakūṭaparvataś cālita iti ... yanv ahaṃ sumerau upanibadhnīyām [MSV,
K01vinv06_u:4390: Wi_72] iti sa tena sumerau parvatarāje upanibaddhaḥ punar āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanenākṛṣṭaḥ sumeruḥ parvato nandopanandau nāgarājau ca cālitau
K01vinv06_u:4393: atha sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavaś calitum ārabdhāḥ padmakarṇikeṣu niṣaṇṇās te bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ kimarthaṃ bhagavaṃ nandopanandau nāgarājau cālitau /
K01vinv06_u:4395: bhikṣavaḥ nandopanandayor nāgarājayor nāsti kampanam iti śrutvā tau ṛddhivikurvitaṃ
K01vinv06_u:4396: kuruta iti āyuṣmāñ cchāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati yanv ahaṃ bhagavataḥ padmanāḍe upanibaddhnīyām iti /
K01vinv06_u:4397: tena bhagavataḥ padmanāḍe upanibaddho niṣkampaṃ sthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4398: yadā tasya ṛddhi ṛddhyā parābhūtā tadā (MSV I 166)
K01vinv06_u:4400: gaccha āyuṣmañ cchāriputra riddhivikurvitam āgaccha gacchāvaḥ gacchāyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana
K01vinv06_u:4401: eṣo 'ham āgata eva yāvad āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano na pratyāgatas tāvad āryāyuṣmān śāriputro gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4402: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte padmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ tataḥ paścād āyuṣmān
K01vinv06_u:4403: mahamaudgalyāyano gataḥ paśyaty āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputraṃ sa kathayaty āgato 'si āyuṣmaṃ
K01vinv06_u:4406: bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmāṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ riddhimatām agro nirdiṣṭo 'tha ca punar āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa riddhyā parājita iti /
K01vinv06_u:4408: na bhikṣava etarhi atīte 'dhvany api śilpakuśalena parājitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:4409: bhūtapūrvaṃ [fol._200v1] madhyadeśe 'nyataraś citrakarācāryo 'bhūt sa kenacid arthakaraṇīyena

K01vinv06_u:5780: atha bhagavān vaiśālakān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5781: evaṃ dvau trayo vā divasā atikrāntaḥ vaiśālakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo vistīrṇaparivārāḥ sakṛcchraś ca kālo vartate /
K01vinv06_u:5782: te teṣāṃ jñātayo bhojanam iti kṛtvā pratyaham upasaṃkrāmanti tair upadrūyamāṇā bhikṣūṇāṃ
K01vinv06_u:5783: kathayanti āryāḥ sakṛcchraḥ kālo vartate 'smākaṃ jñātaya ākāṃkṣamāṇā upasaṃkrāmanti
K01vinv06_u:5784: teṣāṃ vayaṃ pratyaham anuprayacchāmo na ca śaknumo yuṣmākaṃ teṣāṃ ca saṃpādayitum*
K01vinv06_u:5785: aho vatāryakāḥ pratijāgṛyur vayam upakaraṇāni prayacchāma iti bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti /
K01vinv06_u:5790: uktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣubhir bhaktaṃ pratijāgartavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:5792: yāvad abhyavakāśe pratijāgrati peyā ca sādhyate devaś ca vṛṣṭaḥ sā ca naṣṭā /
K01vinv06_u:5799: kalpikaśālāvastūni yeṣu bhaktaṃ na pratijāgartavyaṃ katamāni daśa (MSV I 234.6)
K01vinv06_u:5801: etāni [fol._226r1] śālāvastūni yeṣu bhaktaṃ na pratijāgartavyaṃ /
K01vinv06_u:5813: ārya kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā sthānam etad vidyate yad anujñāsyati /
K01vinv06_u:5822: bhadramukha kiṃ tayā peyayā nāhaṃ svasthaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5824: ārya kiṃ tvayā peyā na pītā /
K01vinv06_u:5837: ārambhyamāṇāntikā ucchrīyamāṇāntikā goniṣādikā udbhūtavastukā saṃmatikā ca /
K01vinv06_u:5839: tadyathā navakarmiko bhikṣur yatra prathamataḥ sthitvā saṃghasya kalpikasthānam iti kṛtvā vācayati idaṃ kalpikasthānam iti /
K01vinv06_u:5842: yathāpi tan navakarmiko bhikṣuḥ śilāyām ucchrīyamāṇāyāṃ tatprathamataḥ śilāyāṃ nyasyamānāyāṃ sāmantakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:5851: bhikṣavo na jānate kathaṃ saṃmantavyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:5853: yat sthānam adhiṣṭhitam antaḥsīmaṃ bahirvyāmaparivāram [fol._226v1] abhimataṃ saṃghasya tat saṃmantavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:5855: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma karaṇīyam* /
K01vinv06_u:5857: idaṃ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitam antaḥsīmaṃ bahirvyāmaparivāraṃ saṃghasya kalpikaśālāṃ saṃmantu /
K01vinv06_u:5858: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ etat kalpikasthānaṃ saṃmanyate ity eṣā jñaptiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5861: idaṃ vastu sarvākārapariniṣṭhitam antaḥsīmaṃ bahirvyāmaparivāraṃ saṃghaḥ kalpikasthānaṃ saṃmanyate /
K01vinv06_u:5862: yenāyuṣmatāṃ kṣamante idaṃ vastu kalpikasthānaṃ saṃmantuṃ te tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv06_u:5864: kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaitad dhārayāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5868: yadā bhagavato 'ntikāt satyāni dṛṣṭāni tadā na paribhuṃkte /
K01vinv06_u:5872: āyuṣmantaḥ siṃhena senāpatinā uddiśya kṛtaṃ māṃsam āhṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:5874: śramaṇaśākyaputrīyaiḥ uddiśya kṛtaṃ māṃsaṃ paribhuktam iti /
K01vinv06_u:5877: trīṇi cākalpikāni māṃsāni na paribhoktavyānīti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5879: mām uddiśya kṛtam iti saṃmukhaṃ dṛṣṭam akalpikaṃ māṃsaṃ na paribhoktavyam iti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5880: śrutam tvām [fol._227r1] uddiśya kṛtam iti akalpikaṃ māṃsaṃ na paribhoktavyam iti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5882: mām uddiśya kṛtam iti saṃcintya akalpikaṃ māṃsaṃ na paribhoktavyam (MSV I 237) iti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5883: bhikṣavas trīṇi kalpikāni māṃsāni paribhoktavyānīti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5885: mām uddiśya kṛtam iti saṃmukham adṛṣṭaṃ kalpikamāṃsaṃ paribhoktavyam iti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5886: aśrutaṃ tvām uddiśya kṛtam iti kalpikamāṃsaṃ paribhoktayam iti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5887: na svayam eva pūrvavad yāvat kalpikaṃ māṃsaṃ paribhoktavyam iti vadāmi /
K01vinv06_u:5892: āryā ekāntaghaṭake śāsane kimarthaṃ pārśvaṃ datvā tiṣṭhatha na kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛtheti /
K01vinv06_u:5894: sakṛcchraḥ kālo vartate paryāptaṃ piṇḍakaṃ nāsādayāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5900: kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā sthānam etad vidyate yad anujñāsyati /
K01vinv06_u:5904: evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre bhikṣavaḥ pratijāgartavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:5910: te bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā pūrvalabdhaṃ gṛhītvā vihāraṃ gacchanti durbhikṣakāle bhuṃjiṣyāma iti kṛtvā kin tu kaukṛtyān na paribhuṃjate /
K01vinv06_u:5913: (MSV I 238) tasmād anujānāmi evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre ākāṃkṣatā prāggṛhītam iti kṛtvā prāggṛhītaṃ paribhoktavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:5917: śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhikṣūn upanimantrya antargṛhe bhojayanti /
K01vinv06_u:5920: āryā yuṣmākaṃ kṛte adhiṣṭhitaṃ bhaktam avaśiṣyate /
K01vinv06_u:5927: tasmād anujānāmi evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre evaṃvidhaṃ dānam iti kṛtvā paribhoktavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:5944: tasmād anujānāmi evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre prāgdattam iti kṛtvā paribhoktavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:5948: śrāddhānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām auttarāpathikāni vanāstikāni phalāni saṃpadyante /
K01vinv06_u:5952: bhikṣavaḥ pratigrahītavyam iti kṛtvā [fol._227v1] kaukṛtyān na paribhuṃjate /
K01vinv06_u:5954: ārya yadā bhagavān loke notpannas tadā tīrthyā dakṣiṇīyāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5955: idānīṃ tu bhagavān loke utpanna idānīṃ bhavanto dakṣiṇīyāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5965: śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhikṣūṇāṃ satkurvatāṃ pravārayatāṃ puṣkarāstikāni anuprayacchanti /
K01vinv06_u:5966: bhikṣava ākāṃkṣanti kin tu kaukṛtyān na paribhuṃjate /
K01vinv06_u:5976: bahuśo mayā āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya svamatena upasthānaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:5977: na ca kadācid vaidyaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ yanv ahaṃ pṛccheyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:5984: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya kṛte na visakṣīreṇa upasthānaṃ kuryām iti /
K01vinv06_u:5985: saṃlakṣitamātra eva śrāvastyā antarhito mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre pratyaṣṭhān nāgararājasya bhavanasamīpe /
K01vinv06_u:5986: tataḥ supratiṣṭhitena nāgarājena dṛṣṭa uktaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:5992: ārya yady evaṃ tiṣṭha tāvad iti /
K01vinv06_u:5993: sa mandākinīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya puruṣapramāṇāni visakṣīrāṇy utpāṭya utpāṭya visakṣīreṇāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pātraṃ pūritam* /
K01vinv06_u:5994: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'sya visāni rujyamānāni nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:5996: ārya kim ākāṃkṣase visāni paribhoktum iti /
K01vinv06_u:6001: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano visakṣīreṇa pātraṃ pūrayitvā mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre 'ntarhitaḥ śrāvastyāṃ pratyaṣṭhāt* jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārame
K01vinv06_u:6002: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa vaidyopadeśena visakṣīraṃ paribhuktam* /
K01vinv06_u:6004: (fol. 228r1; MSV,Wi 112) + + + + + + + + gaccha śrāvastyāṃ jetavane maṇḍapakariṇyāṃ chorayitvā āgaccheti /
K01vinv06_u:6005: sa pavanabalavegavāhinā javena śrāvastīm āgamya jetavana ///

K01vinv06_u:6007: (228r3) vardhayito dhanena pālita iti dhanapālako dhanapālaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
