K01vinv06_u:6009: (228r4) kānicid visāni paribhuktāni kānicid āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa aparāṇi saṃghe caritāni /
K01vinv06_u:6013: durlabhāni bhavanto mānuṣāṇāṃ divyāni visāni tasmād anujānāmi durlabhāni divyāni visānīti / / /
K01vinv06_u:6014: (228r6; cf. MSV I 241.1ff. which has been suplied from Divy 123ff.)
K01vinv06_u:6015: bhadraṃkare nagare ṣaḍ jñātā mahāpuṇyāḥ prativasanti miṇḍhako gṛhapatiḥ miṇḍhakapatnī miṇḍhakaputraḥ miṇḍhakasnuṣā miṇḍhakadāso miṇḍhakadāsī
K01vinv06_u:6017: evaṃ miṇḍhako gṛhapatir jñāto mahāpuṇyaḥ kathaṃ miṇḍhakapatnī sā ekasyārthāya sthālīṃ sādhayati śatāni sahasrāṇi ca paribhuṃjate evaṃ miṇḍhakapatnī
K01vinv06_u:6018: (228r8) parityajati tadā pūrṇa eva tiṣṭhati na ca parikṣīyate /
K01vinv06_u:6019: evaṃ miṇḍhakaputraḥ miṇḍhakasnuṣā ekasyārthāya gatvā saṃpādayati śatasya sahasrasya ca paryāptaṃ bhavati / / /
K01vinv06_u:6021: sā yadā ekāṃ mātrāṃ pratijāgarti tadā sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyante /
K01vinv06_u:6024: ayaṃ miṇḍhako gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro bhadraṃkare nagare prativasati /
K01vinv06_u:6026: (MSV I 242) tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:6028: bhikṣūṇām ārocaya tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ .. + yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ [MSV,
K01vinv06_u:6029: Wi_114] janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ gantuṃ sa cīvarakāṇi pratigṛhṇātv iti /
K01vinv06_u:6030: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇām ārocayati /
K01vinv06_u:6031: [fol._228v1] bhagavān āyuṣmanto janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ + + yuṣmākam utsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ gantuṃ sa cīvarakāṇi pratigṛhṇātv iti /
K01vinv06_u:6033: te bhikṣava āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti /
K01vinv06_u:6035: dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraḥ arhann arhaparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caraṃ bhadraṃkaraṃ
K01vinv06_u:6036: nagaraṃ samprasthitaḥ yadā bhagavatā śrāvastyāṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ tadā tīrthyā nirbhartsitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6039: gautama āgacchatīti śrutvā ca punar vyathitāḥ pūrvaṃ tāvad vayaṃ śramaṇena gautamena
K01vinv06_u:6040: madhyadeśān nirvāsitāḥ sa yadīhāgamiṣyati niścayenāsmān ito 'pi nirvāsayiṣyati tad
K01vinv06_u:6043: dharmalābho dharmalābhaḥ ārya kim idaṃ avalokitā bhavataḥ (MSV I 243)
K01vinv06_u:6045: dṛṣṭāsmābhir yuṣmākaṃ saṃpattir yāvad vipattin na paśyāmas tāvad gacchāmaḥ āryakā asmākaṃ vipattir bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:6046: bhavantaḥ śramaṇo gautama kṣurāśaniṃ pātayann anekā aputrikā (228v5)
K01vinv06_u:6048: ārya yady evaṃ yasminn eva kāle sthātavyaṃ tasminn eva kāle 'smākaṃ parityāgaḥ kriyate /
K01vinv06_u:6055: bhadraṃkaranagarasāmanatakena sarvaṃ janakāyam udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ praveśayata :
K01vinv06_u:6063: bhadraṃkarasāmantakena sarvo janakāya udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ praveśitaḥ śādvalāni kṛṣṭāni sthaṇḍilāni pātitāni puṣpavṛkṣāś chinnāḥ pānīyāni viṣadūṣitāni /
K01vinv06_u:6065: na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ bhagavato 'satkāram (228v8)
K01vinv06_u:6066: adhyupekṣeyaṃ yena nāma bhagavatā trikalpāsaṃkhyeyair anekaiś ca duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryānuttaraṃ
K01vinv06_u:6067: jñānam adhigatam .. .. bhagava sarvalokaprativiśiṣṭaḥ sarvavādavijayī śūnye janapade cārikām cariṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:6076: yūyaṃ (228v10) bhadraṃkaranagarasamantād āvāsayateti tato vātabalāhakair devaputrair
K01vinv06_u:6077: viṣadūṣitāni pānīyāni śoṣitāni varṣabalāhakair eva kūpodapānavāpīsaras taḍāgāny aṣṭāṅgopetasya
K01vinv06_u:6087: bhavanto na kadācid asmābhir evaṃ janapadā ṛddhasphītā dṛṣṭapūrvā iti /
K01vinv06_u:6089: bhavanto dṛṣṭo vo yas tāvad acetanān bhāvān anvāvartayati sa yuṣmān nānvāvartayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:6097: bhikṣopajīvitaḥ kim asau yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣāṃ vārayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:6100: yadi yūyaṃ kriyākāraṃ kuruta na kenacit śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:6101: ya upasaṃkrāmati ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍayitavya iti /
K01vinv06_u:6104: tato bhagavān anupūrveṇa bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaram anuprāpto bhadraṃkare viharati dakṣiṇāyatane /
K01vinv06_u:6105: tena khalu samayena kāpilavāstuno brāhmaṇadārikā bhadraṃkare nagare pariṇītā /
K01vinv06_u:6106: tayā prākārasthayā bhagavān andhakāre sthito dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6108: ayaṃ bhagavān śākyakulanandanaḥ śākyakulād rājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6109: yady atra sopānaṃ syād ahaṃ pradīpam ādāyāvatareyam iti /
K01vinv06_u:6110: tato bhagavatā tasyāś cetasā cittam ājñāya sopānaṃ nirmitam* /
K01vinv06_u:6111: tato 'sau hṛṣṭatuṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ pradīpam ādāya sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv06_u:6112: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt pradīpaṃ sthāpayitvā pādau śirasā vanditvā niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv06_u:6113: tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedikī purvavad yāvac charaṇagatām atiprasannām iti
K01vinv06_u:6114: atha bhagavāṃs tāṃ dārikām idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:6115: ehi tvaṃ dārike yena miṇḍhakagṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrama /
K01vinv06_u:6118: gṛhapate tvām uddiśyāham ihāgatas tvaṃ ca dvāraṃ baddhvāvasthito yuktam etad evaṃ hy atitheḥ pratipattuṃ yathā tvaṃ pratipanna iti /
K01vinv06_u:6119: yadi kathayati gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛta iti /
K01vinv06_u:6121: tava putrasya paṃcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhas tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:6122: sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti pūryata eva na parikṣīyate /
K01vinv06_u:6123: na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān datvāgantum iti /
K01vinv06_u:6124: evaṃ bhadanteti sā dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃprasthitā /
K01vinv06_u:6125: yathāparijñātaiva kenacid evaṃ miṇḍhakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatā /
K01vinv06_u:6128: sa (MSV I 246) kathayati dārike vande buddhaṃ bhagavantam* /
K01vinv06_u:6130: tvām evāham uddiśyāgatas tvaṃ ca dvāraṃ baddhāvasthitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6134: dārike gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacit śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśaṇāyopasaṃkramitavyam* /
K01vinv06_u:6135: yaḥ upasaṃkrāmati sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣapaṇān daṇḍya iti /
K01vinv06_u:6137: tava putrasya paṃcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhas tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv06_u:6138: sa yadi śataṃ sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti pūryate eva na parikṣīyate /
K01vinv06_u:6139: na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān datvāgantum iti /
K01vinv06_u:6141: na kaścid etat saṃjānīte nūnaṃ sarvajñaḥ sa bhagavān* /

K01vinv06_u:6466: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam anekeṣāṃ ca tatsabhāgānāṃ gandharvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ //
K01vinv06_u:6468: iti hi mahārāja atra te dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhavatu śrute mate vijñāte vijñātamātraṃ /
K01vinv06_u:6469: asmiṃ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe virūḍhakasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam anekeṣāṃ ca tatsabhāgānāṃ kumbhāṇḍaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
K01vinv06_u:6472: iti hi mahārāja ine mene dapphe daḍapphe eṣa evānto duḥkhasyeti /
K01vinv06_u:6473: asmiṃ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe virūpākṣasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam anekeṣāṃ ca tatsabhāgānāṃ nāgaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
K01vinv06_u:6475: atra te mahārāja māśā tuṣā saṃśāmā [Bhaiṣ-v(Ch/
K01vinv06_u:6476: W)_122] sarvatra virāḍi eṣa evānto duḥkhasyeti /
K01vinv06_u:6477: asmiṃ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam anekeṣāṃ (fol. 233r1 = GBM
K01vinv06_u:6482: saced devānāṃ devāḥ pramattā ratibahulā na cirasthitikaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv06_u:6483: atha manuṣyāṇām alpāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ evam eva na cirasthitikam eva /
K01vinv06_u:6484: yanv ahaṃ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kāśyapasya ca bhikṣoḥ śāsanam upanyasya parinirvāyeyam iti viditvā dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ mahārājam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:6485: mama te mahārāja parinirvṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi śāsane ārakṣā karaṇīyeti /
K01vinv06_u:6487: tvayāpi mahārāja dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ārakṣā karaṇīyeti /
K01vinv06_u:6489: tvayāpi mahārāja paścimasyāṃ diśi ārakṣā karaṇīyeti /
K01vinv06_u:6491: tvayāpi mahārāja uttarasyāṃ diśi ārakṣā karaṇīyeti //
K01vinv06_u:6492: tataś catvāro mahārājānaḥ pramuditamanaso bhagavantam idam avocan* /
K01vinv06_u:6494: vayam ārakṣāṃ kariṣyāma iti viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dṛṣṭasatyā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6495: bhagavatā āyuṣmate mahākāśyapāya kṛtsnaṃ śāsanam upanyastaṃ /
K01vinv06_u:6497: tvayāpy ānanda śāsanakāryakaraṇe autsukyam āpattavyam iti / //
K01vinv06_u:6498: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6499: kiṃ bhadanta caturbhir mahārājaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena catvāro mahārājāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6502: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv06_u:6503: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi /
K01vinv06_u:6504: pūrvavad yāvac chāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K01vinv06_u:6505: tena khalu samayena mahāsamudre dvau nāgau prativasataḥ śvāso mahāśvāsaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:6506: kūṭaśālmalyām api dvau suparṇināv aṭṭeśvaraś cūḍeśvaraś ca /
K01vinv06_u:6507: yadā śvāsamahāśvāsau tābhyām abhidrūyete tadā pātālaṃ praviśato /
K01vinv06_u:6508: yāvad apareṇa samayena śvāsamahāśvāsābhyāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāc charaṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni /
K01vinv06_u:6514: idānīṃ ko hetur yena vayaṃ sumerupratyāhatāv iva pavanasalilavegau yuvām āsādya pratinivṛttāv iti /
K01vinv06_u:6518: yady evaṃ vayam api grahīṣyāma iti /
K01vinv06_u:6519: tau tābhyāṃ sārdhaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike saṃprasthitau /
K01vinv06_u:6521: catvāraś ca lokapālāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃprasthitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6527: yady evaṃ vayam api kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāc charaṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni saṃgṛhītvā praṇidhānaṃ kurma iti /
K01vinv06_u:6530: tataḥ saṃbhūya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6533: evaṃ vayam apy anena kuśalamūlena catvāro lokapālāḥ syāma :
K01vinv06_u:6534: yaś cāsau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
K01vinv06_u:6535: (MSV I 262) so 'py asmākaṃ bhagavān eva mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre dharmaṃ deśayed /
K01vinv06_u:6536: vayaṃ ca taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭasatyā evam eva svabhavanaṃ gacchāma iti /
K01vinv06_u:6537: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo ye te catvāro nāgasuparṇinaḥ eta eva te catvāro lokapālāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6538: yo 'sau śvāsa eṣa evāsau dhṛṭarāṣṭras tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:6539: mahāśvāso virūḍhakaḥ aṭṭeśvaro 'sau virūpākṣaḥ cūḍeśvaro 'sau vaiśravaṇaḥ tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:6540: yad ebhiḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāc charaṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni pratigṛhya
K01vinv06_u:6541: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena catvāro lokapālā jātā mamāntike satyadarśanaṃ
K01vinv06_u:6543: tāṃ ca dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā kaineya ṛṣiḥ paraṃ vismayam upagato bhagavati cābhiprasannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6544: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā /
K01vinv06_u:6545: yāṃ śrutvā kaineyarṣiṇā sahasatyābhisamayād anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ /
K01vinv06_u:6546: tato 'sāv avetyaprasādasamanvāgato 'ṣṭau pānāny ādāya cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ kolapānam
K01vinv06_u:6547: aśvatthapānam udumbarapānaṃ paruṣakapānaṃ kharjūrapānaṃ mṛdvīkāpānaṃ ca yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta /
K01vinv06_u:6549: imāni bhadanta aṣṭau pānāni pūrvakair ṛṣibhiḥ stutāni varṇitāni /
K01vinv06_u:6552: pratigṛhṇāti bhagavān kaineyasya ṛṣer antikād aṣṭau pānāni anukampām upādāya /
K01vinv06_u:6557: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāni kāle marditāni //
K01vinv06_u:6558: kāle parisrutāni akāle adhiṣṭhitāni na paribhoktavyāni / //
K01vinv06_u:6559: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāni kāle marditāni kāle parisrutāni akāle adhiṣṭhitāni na paribhoktavyāni //
K01vinv06_u:6560: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni akāle marditāni akāle parisrutāni paścādbhaktena paribhoktavyāni /
K01vinv06_u:6561: rātryāś ca prathame yāmātikrāntā na paribhoktavyāni //
K01vinv06_u:6562: {Dutt: As the Tibetan translation does not agree with the Sanskrit textr,
K01vinv06_u:6563: we reconstruct here the Sanskrit from Tibetant:
K01vinv06_u:6564: itīmāni bhikṣavo 'ṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāni kāle marditāni kāle adhiṣṭhitāni kāle paribhoktavyāni /
K01vinv06_u:6566: rātryāś ca prathame yāme 'tikrānte na paribhoktavyāni /
K01vinv06_u:6567: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāni akāle marditāni akāle parisrutāni akāle adhiṣṭhitāni na paribhoktavyāni /
K01vinv06_u:6568: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāni kāle marditāni akāle parisrutāni akāle adhiṣṭhitāni na paribhoktavyāni /
K01vinv06_u:6569: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni akāle pratigrāhitāni akāle marditāni akāle parisrutāni paścādbhaktena na paribhoktavyāni /
K01vinv06_u:6571: atha kaineya ṛṣir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:6572: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān* śvo bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv06_u:6574: atha kaineya ṛṣir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6575: bhagavān api mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre 'ntarhita ādumāyāṃ pratyaṣṭhāt sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K01vinv06_u:6576: atha kaineya ṛṣiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmantrayate /
K01vinv06_u:6582: tena khalu samayena śailo nāma ṛṣiḥ kaineyasya ṛṣer bhāgineyas tasminn āvasathe rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6583: aśroṣīt śaila ṛṣiḥ kaineyam ṛṣiṃ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmantrayantam* /
K01vinv06_u:6584: śrutvā ca punaḥ kaineyam ṛṣim idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:6585: kiṃ punas te ṛṣe sabrahmacāriṇo nimantritāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6586: rājā vā māgadhaśreṇyo biṃbisāro rāṣṭranivāsī janakāyo yathepsitasya vā ṛṣidharmasya parisamāptir iti /
K01vinv06_u:6588: na me śaila sabrahmacāriṇa upanimantritā nāpi rājā māgadhaśreṇyo biṃbisāro rāṣṭranivāsī janakāyo nāpi yathepsitasya ṛṣidharmasya parisamāptiḥ
K01vinv06_u:6589: api tu mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita iti tasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny āhṛṣṭāni /
K01vinv06_u:6591: ka eṣa ṛṣe buddho nāma iti /
K01vinv06_u:6592: asti śaila śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ
K01vinv06_u:6598: santi śaila kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6599: santi brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api kulaputrāḥ pūrvavat tam eva bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6600: sa eṣa ṛṣe saṃgho nāma iti /
K01vinv06_u:6601: ayaṃ ca śaila saṃghaḥ pūrvakaś ca (MSV I 265) buddhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6602: sa eṣa (fol. 234v1 = GBM 6.781) buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho mayā bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6603: atha śailaṛṣir buddhālambanayā smṛtyā kālyam evotthāya paṃcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāms tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6605: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv06_u:6606: labdhavān śaila ṛṣiḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K01vinv06_u:6607: atha kaineya ṛṣis tām eva śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvat saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati /
K01vinv06_u:6608: tena buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayamānena śailaḥ pravrajito dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6612: aham api buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā pravrajiṣyāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:6613: atha kaineya ṛṣir anekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena
K01vinv06_u:6614: saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ
K01vinv06_u:6615: nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv06_u:6616: tato bhagavāṃs tasmai dakṣiṇām ādiśya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6617: atha kaineya ṛṣir yat tatrotpādanadharmakaṃ sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakaṃ kṛtvā {MS tatrotsadanadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakaṃ kṛtvā;
K01vinv06_u:6619: BHSD s.v. utsīdana} paṃcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6621: ekāntasthitaḥ kaineya ṛṣir bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:6622: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike (MSV I 266)
K01vinv06_u:6624: labdhavān kaineya ṛṣiḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K01vinv06_u:6625: atha bhagavāṃs tad bhikṣusahasraṃ pravrajyopasaṃpādya nadyāḥ prabhadrikāyās tīre vāsam upagataś chatrāmbuvane {MS chatrāpravane} /
K01vinv06_u:6626: tatra bhagavatā paṃcabhikṣuśatāny āyuṣmate brāhmaṇakapphiṇāya dattāni /
K01vinv06_u:6629: tatra ye āyuṣmatā brāhmaṇkapphiṇenāvacoditās taiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:6632: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6633: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān śāriputro mahāprajñānām agryo vyākṛtaḥ āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyano mahardhikānāṃ mahānubhāvānām* /
K01vinv06_u:6634: atha ca punar ye āyuṣmatā brāhmaṇakapphiṇenāvacoditās tair ahatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:6638: bhikṣava etarhi yathā tathātīte 'dhvani ye (fol. 235r1 = GBM 6.782)
K01vinv06_u:6641: ye śāriputreṇa te paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6643: bhūtacaraṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatarasminn araṇyāyatane dvau ṛṣī prativasataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6645: yāvad apareṇa samayena tayor ekaḥ (MSV I 267) kālagataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6646: tatas tasya māṇavakā guruviyogaduḥkhadaurmanasyasaṃtaptā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramantas tasya dvitīyasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6647: tena te dṛṣṭā aśruparyākulekṣaṇāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca /
K01vinv06_u:6651: yanv aham eṣām upasaṃgrahaṃ kuryām iti /
K01vinv06_u:6653: yāvad apareṇa samayena so 'pi ṛṣir glānaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6659: tatra yasya paṃcaśatāni dattāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā ārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K01vinv06_u:6660: yasyārdhatṛtīyāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā rūpadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K01vinv06_u:6661: yasyāpy ardhatṛtīyāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K01vinv06_u:6662: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir yena tāni paṃcamāṇavakaśatāny ārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāny eṣa evāsau kapphiṇo bhikṣus tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:6663: yenārdhatṛtīyāni rūpadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāny eṣa evāsau maudgalyāyano bhikṣuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6664: yenāpy ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpitāny eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6665: api tu bhikṣavo ye kapphiṇenāvacoditās te tīkṣṇendriyāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6668: yadi śāriputreṇāvacoditā nābhaviṣyan uṣmagatā apy anayagatā abhaviṣyan* /
K01vinv06_u:6676: vivāhaḥ kiṃ nu rājā vā rāṣṭraṃ vopanimantritam* /
K01vinv06_u:6677: athavā te mahāprajña pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama //
K01vinv06_u:6678: na me vivāho rājā vā rāṣṭraṃ vopanimantritam*
K01vinv06_u:6680: so 'yaṃ buddha iti śrutvā śailaḥ saṃvegam āgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6681: ka eṣa buddhaḥ kaineya pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama //
K01vinv06_u:6684: dṛṣṭaṃ hy atītaṃ buddhena tathā dṛṣṭam anāgatam* /
K01vinv06_u:6686: yac ca kiṃcid abhijñeyaṃ sarvaṃ tad vetti tatvavit* /
K01vinv06_u:6688: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca tasmād buddho nirucyate //
K01vinv06_u:6690: prahātavyaṃ prahīnaṃ ca tasmād buddho nirucyate //
K01vinv06_u:6694: nihato yena māraś ca kṛṣṇabandhuḥ savāhanaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6697: vārāṇasīṃ purīṃ gatvā taṃ namasye kṛtāñjaliḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6699: bahūn mocayate satvāṃs taṃ namasye kṛtāñjaliḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6700: kutra buddhaḥ sa bhagavān kiyad dūre vināyakaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6705: tad ghāṭakam ivottaptaṃ bimbaṃ hemamayaṃ yathā //
K01vinv06_u:6724: acintyaṃ dhyāyinām agryaṃ buddhaṃ drakṣyasy anuttaram* //
K01vinv06_u:6726: dhmāyantam agniskandhaṃ vā buddhaṃ drakṣyasi gautamam* //
K01vinv06_u:6731: satyāni saṃprakāśayati madhv iva nīḍakāt sravat* /
K01vinv06_u:6734: duḥkhaṃ naikaprakāraṃ ca yac ca duḥkhasya saṃbhavam* /
K01vinv06_u:6736: adhanānāṃ dhanaṃ dātā āturāṃś ca cikitsati /
K01vinv06_u:6750: abhidhyā nāsya kāmeṣu maitracittaḥ sa jantuṣu //
K01vinv06_u:6753: śṛṇoti vividhāñ chabdān ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6754: cittaṃ pareṣāṃ jānāti kliṣṭaṃ vā yadi vāśubham* //
K01vinv06_u:6759: śāntendriyaḥ śāntacittaḥ pūrṇo vā dhyāyate hṛdi //
K01vinv06_u:6762: īdṛśo bhagavāñ chaila vahniskandha iva tejasā /
K01vinv06_u:6764: yo 'pi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta tāyinaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6766: etaṃ brāhmaṇa paśyanti lābhas teṣām anuttaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6767: dṛṣṭvā ye śaraṇaṃ yānti teṣāṃ lābhabharas tataḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6768: saṃvinno brāhmaṇaḥ śailaḥ śrutvā varṇaṃ mahāmuneḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6770: na me manuṣyabhūtasya varṇa etādṛśaḥ śrutaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6772: mānadhvajaṃ prahāya tvaṃ vaṇijo vā dhanārthikaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6775: niryāti brāhmaṇaḥ śailo yena buddhāśramaḥ śubhaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6782: śailo vācam udīrayati bhavān kaccid anāmayaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6784: buddhaḥ pratyavadac chailaṃ tat khalv aham anāmayaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6787: carāmi virajo loke śuddhaḥ śuci nirāmayaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6790: mā pariklāntakāyo 'si kaccid brāhmaṇa te sukham* //
K01vinv06_u:6796: niṣadya brāhmaṇaḥ śailo lakṣaṇān īkṣate muneḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6804: dvayaṃ tatra na paśyāmi tava gātreṣu gautama //
K01vinv06_u:6806: rasanānuttamā vāpi kaccij jihvā na hrasvikā //
K01vinv06_u:6810: udumbare vā kusumaṃ durlabho hi mahāmuniḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6811: vāri grīṣmābhitapto vā bhojanaṃ vā bubhukṣitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6814: buddhaḥ pratyavadac chailaṃ kāṃkṣāṃ brāhmaṇa nirṇuda //
K01vinv06_u:6815: ubhe ca cakṣuṣī śrotre pracchādayati jihvayā /
K01vinv06_u:6818: adrākṣīd brāhmaṇa śailo guhyaṃ koṣāvṛtaṃ muniḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6822: mantreṣv āptāni me yāni dvātriṃśal lakṣaṇāny aham* /
K01vinv06_u:6823: sarvaṃ tat tava gātreṣu paripūrṇam anūnakam* //
K01vinv06_u:6827: rājā tvam arho bhavituṃ cakravartī nararṣabhaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6829: vartayati kṣitau cakraṃ rājā bhava mahīpatiḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6830: rājāham asmi śaileti dharmarājo hy anuttaraḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6832: kalyo 'smy ahaṃ kule jātaḥ kṣatriyo 'smy abhijātitaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6833: vitrāsya sabalaṃ māraṃ prāptaḥ saṃbodhim uttamām* //
K01vinv06_u:6834: smṛtir brāhmaṇa cakraṃ me prajñā me parināyakaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6835: vīryaṃ hayaḥ śīghrajavo dhuraṃ vahati coditaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6836: samādhir me maṇiśreṣṭho hy andhakāro prabhākaraḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6837: upekṣā hastināgaś ca dhuraṃ vahati coditaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6838: strī vai ratiḥ sarāgāṇāṃ prītir brāhmaṇa me ratiḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6839: prasṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇa śreṣṭhaṃ dhanaṃ gṛhagataṃ mayā //
K01vinv06_u:6842: prabodhayāmi yaiḥ suptām andhabhūtām imāṃ prajām* //
K01vinv06_u:6843: jitā mayā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśatrur na vidyate /
K01vinv06_u:6844: catasro me parṣadaś ca caturaṃgaṃ balaṃ mama //
K01vinv06_u:6855: mama samyaktvaṃ loke 'sminn ālokaṃ prāṇināṃ dadat* /
K01vinv06_u:6856: chinna dṛg jñānaśastreṇa vivekaś cāyudhaṃ mama //
K01vinv06_u:6864: śūrayuddhaṃ mayā dattaṃ dharmabherī mayā hatā /
K01vinv06_u:6868: trayo loke mahācaurā yair iyaṃ bādhyate prajā /
K01vinv06_u:6869: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca sarve te nāśitā mayā //
K01vinv06_u:6872: ārabhya paramaṃ vīryam āsravā nihatā mayā /
K01vinv06_u:6874: daṃṣṭrābalī yathā siṃha āsādya prāṇino vane /
K01vinv06_u:6875: samaṃ teṣu praharati bālye madhye mahallake //
K01vinv06_u:6878: āturasya ca me ha tvaṃ kāṃkṣāṃ vinaya gautama /
K01vinv06_u:6880: vinaya śāmya te kāṃkṣām adhimucyasva brāhmaṇa /
K01vinv06_u:6886: pravartayasi kevalaṃ cakraṃ yathā gautama bhāṣase //
K01vinv06_u:6887: senāpatiḥ ko bhavataḥ śrāvakaḥ śāstur ātmajaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6888: yat tvayā vartitaṃ cakram anuvartayati paṇḍitaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6889: asti me śrāvako brahman sadṛśaḥ prajñayātmajaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6892: yan mayā vartitaṃ cakram anuvartayati paṇḍitaḥ //
K01vinv06_u:6894: lokeṣv āścaryam utpannam aho ratnatrayaṃ param* //
K01vinv06_u:6895: ahaṃ vadāmi bhadraṃ te śrāvakatvam upāgataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6899: idaṃ bhavantaḥ śṛṇuta cakṣuṣmān bhāṣate yathā /
K01vinv06_u:6901: ya icchanty anugacchantu ye necchanti vrajantu te /
K01vinv06_u:6906: rocate ced iyaṃ tava pravraja jinaśāsane /
K01vinv06_u:6913: ehi bhikṣave ity āha sa teṣām upasaṃpadā //
K01vinv06_u:6919: tebhyas taṃ dharmam ājñāya kathāṃ tatrānulomikīm* /
K01vinv06_u:6923: saddharmaṃ ca dhanaśreṣṭhaṃ śikṣāṃ ca jinavarṇitām* /
K01vinv06_u:6927: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca satkṛtiṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajet* //
K01vinv06_u:6928: etad dhi śaraṇaṃ loke varṇitaṃ tat tvadarśinā /
K01vinv06_u:6933: atha bhagavān kāśīṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran kāśīpaṭṭam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6934: tasmiṃś ca kāśīpaṭṭe śobhitapūrviṇau dvau pitāputrau pravrajitau /
K01vinv06_u:6936: bhagavān śrāvakasaṃghaḥ kāśīṣu janapade cārikāṃ carann ihānuprāptaḥ śrāntakāyo bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaś ca /
K01vinv06_u:6937: yan nu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ yavāgūpānenopanimantrayāmaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6938: tat kiṃ tvaṃ peyāṃ samudānayasi āhosvid bhikṣusaṃgham upanimaṃtrayasīti /
K01vinv06_u:6946: ārya etad apy asti te kauśalyam* /
K01vinv06_u:6967: tato 'sau gṛhapatiḥ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvat purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇas tatra praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ cāryate /
K01vinv06_u:6978: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavo jātīyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dhārayanti /
K01vinv06_u:6981: upasthāpayati sātisāro bhavati sthāpayitvā vaidyapūrviṇāṃ śastrakoṣaṃ kāyasthapūrviṇām api bhājanaṃ sūcikapravrajitānāṃ sūcīgṛham iti /
K01vinv06_u:6982: (fol. 238r1 = GBM 6.788; MSV I 282) bhagavān malleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran pāpām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6987: aśrauṣuḥ pāpeyā mallā bhagavān malleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran pāpām anuprāptaḥ pāpāyāṃ viharati jalūkāvanaṣaṇḍa iti /
K01vinv06_u:6989: bhavantaḥ śrūyate bhagavān malleṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran pāpām anuprāptaḥ pāpāyāṃ viharati jalūkāvanaṣaṇḍa iti /
K01vinv06_u:6990: saced asmākam ekaiko buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyati apare 'vakāsaṃ na lapsyante /
K01vinv06_u:6992: na kenacid asmākam ekākinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6994: yo yuṣmākam ekākī bhojayati sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti /
K01vinv06_u:6995: atha pāpeyā mallāḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6996: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:6997: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān pāpeyān mallān bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv06_u:6998: atha pāpeyā mallā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:6999: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavan* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K01vinv06_u:7001: atha pāpeyā mallā bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7008: pūrvavad yāvat ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti /
K01vinv06_u:7014: ayaṃ bhadanta roco mallamahāmātro na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7015: sādhv asya bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathaiṣa buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe abhiprasīded iti /
K01vinv06_u:7017: atha bhagavatā rocasya mahāmātrasya tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā roco mallamahāmātro buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ
K01vinv06_u:7018: atha roco mallamahāmātraḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjalīṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv06_u:7019: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K01vinv06_u:7021: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā pāpeyā mallā (fol. 238v1 = GBM 6.789)
K01vinv06_u:7023: sacet te roca pāpeyā mallā anujñāsyanti evaṃ te 'ham adhivāsayāmi /
K01vinv06_u:7024: atha roco mallamahāmātro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena pāpeyā mallās tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7026: āgamayantu tāvad bhavanto yāvad ahaṃ tatprathamataraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojaye bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:7028: na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati bhagavantaṃ bhojayituṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:7030: asmābhis tatprathamataraṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrito na vayam anujānīma iti /
K01vinv06_u:7032: yadi nānujānītha ekaṃ khādyakaṃ cārayāmi pānakaṃ ceti /
K01vinv06_u:7035: anujānīmaḥ sacet saṃghagatā tena dakṣiṇā pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavati /
K01vinv06_u:7038: bhavantas tādṛśaṃ khādyakaṃ sajjīkuruta yenaikenaiva paryāptir bhavati ahaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni dadāmīti /
K01vinv06_u:7042: atha pāpeyā mallās tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
K01vinv06_u:7043: pūrvavad yāvat purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7044: tato roco mallamahāmātraḥ khādyakaṃ cārayitum ārabdhaḥ pānakaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:7055: pāpeyānāṃ mallānām asāv āhāraḥ paribhogaṃ na gataḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7058: ehi buddha ehi dharma ehi saṃgha idaṃ gṛhāṇeti /
K01vinv06_u:7061: praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
K01vinv06_u:7062: yadi kathayanti yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
K01vinv06_u:7067: evaṃ dharme vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau virāgāṇām agrya iti /
K01vinv06_u:7068: saṃghe vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau gaṇānām agrya iti /
K01vinv06_u:7072: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān svātir navāgatas taruṇo 'cirapravrajitaḥ acirāgata imaṃ dharmavinayam* /
K01vinv06_u:7074: uktaṃ bhagavatā yaiś cālpaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca prabhūtaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca praṇītaṃ dattaṃ
K01vinv06_u:7075: yaiś cāttamanaskaiḥ parikarma kṛtaṃ yaiś ca prasannacittair abhyanumoditaṃ (fol. 239r1 = GBM 6.790)
K01vinv06_u:7078: sa kāṣṭhaṃ pāṭayitum ārabdho yāvad anyatamasmāt pūtidārusuṣirān niṣkramyāśīviṣeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṅguṣṭhe dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7079: sa viṣeṇa saṃmūrchito bhūmau patito lālā vāhayati mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayati akṣiṇī ca saṃparivartayati /
K01vinv06_u:7087: yadi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat* jñātibhir asya cikitsā kāritā abhaviṣyad iti /
K01vinv06_u:7098: bhikṣavo na jānate kīdṛśaṃ vikṛtabhojanam iti /
K01vinv06_u:7101: āryā yuṣmākam eva śāstā sarvajño bhagavān sarvadarśī sa eva jñāsyatīti /
K01vinv06_u:7104: vikṛtabhojanaṃ bhikṣava uccāraḥ prasrāvaś chāyikā mṛttikā ca /
K01vinv06_u:7105: tatra uccāraḥ acirajātakānāṃ vatsakānāṃ teṣām eva ca prasrāvaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7108: mṛttikā pṛthivyāṃ caturaṃgulam apanīyoddhartavyā iti vikṛtabhojanam iti /
K01vinv06_u:7109: tato bhikṣubhir āyuṣmataḥ svāter vikṛtabhojanaṃ dattam* /
K01vinv06_u:7113: śakṣyasi tvam ānanda mamāntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣo
K01vinv06_u:7114: rakṣāṃ kartuṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca /
K01vinv06_u:7116: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ bhāṣate sma /
K01vinv06_u:7118: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
K01vinv06_u:7119: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṃgale hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani
K01vinv06_u:7124: acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje /
K01vinv06_u:7126: amare amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvati rakṣā svātiṃ sarvopadravabhayarogebhyaḥ svāhā /
K01vinv06_u:7127: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato 'ntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣoḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:7129: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7130: āscaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ca bhagavatā mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā bahukarā ca /
K01vinv06_u:7131: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā mamātīte 'py adhvany akṣaṇapratipannasya (fol. 239v1 = GBM 6.791)
K01vinv06_u:7132: vinipatitaśarīrasyāpi mahāmāyūrī vidyārājā upakarā bahukarā ca /
K01vinv06_u:7134: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo himavati parvatarāje dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājaḥ prativasati sma /
K01vinv06_u:7135: so 'nayā mahāmāyūryā vidyayā kālyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā divā svastyayanena viharati /
K01vinv06_u:7136: so 'yaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svastyayanena viharati /
K01vinv06_u:7137: so 'pareṇa samayena saṃbahulābhir vanamayūrībhiḥ sārdham ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānaṃ
K01vinv06_u:7138: parvatapārśveṇa parvatapārśvam atyarthaṃ kāmarāgaraktaḥ kāme 'nugṛddho grathito mūrchito
K01vinv06_u:7141: sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrair hiṃsakair avatāraprekṣibhir mayūrapāśair baddhaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7142: so 'py atra madhyagataḥ pramūḍhaḥ smṛtiṃ ca labdhvā imām eva mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ manasyakārṣīt* /
K01vinv06_u:7143: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṅgalye hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre
K01vinv06_u:7145: manasi mānasi mahāmānasi acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje
K01vinv06_u:7146: amare amṛte amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe vimukte jīvati rakṣa
K01vinv06_u:7149: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājas tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:7150: tadāpi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ca etarhy api mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ceti /
K01vinv06_u:7151: paśya bhadanta yāvac ca bhagavataḥ svāter bhikṣor vidyayā svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv06_u:7154: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nāgamaṇḍaliko 'nyatamaḥ kṣatriyadārakaḥ sarpeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv06_u:7157: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau nāgamaṇḍalikaḥ ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv06_u:7158: yo 'sau dārakaḥ svātir bhikṣus tena kālena tena samayena /
